profile.backstory: Initiated as an expendable devotee in a shadow‚Äëswaddled sect, the Novice of the Cult was forever altered when a ritual meant for another went awry. A fracture tore open in reality, and an unseen patron pressed its will upon the Novice‚Äôs unguarded mind. The cult embraced the mistake as prophecy, elevating the Novice to serve as conduit and experiment alike.
profile.behavior: They move with hushed deliberation, pausing often as though listening to a voice none else can hear. When danger rises, their hands twitch in reflexive, pact‚Äëfueled motions.
profile.personality: Soft‚Äëspoken yet unsettlingly intense, they balance deference with a simmering hunger for deeper secrets. When the patron‚Äôs influence surges, their quiet facade slips into fervid, unblinking focus.

feats.name: Dual Wielder
feats.description:
You master fighting with two weapons, gaining the following benefits:

You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you are wielding a separate melee weapon in each hand.
You can use two-weapon fighting even when the one-handed melee weapons you are wielding aren't light.
You can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one.
feats.summary: Harness swift, twin‚Äëweapon momentum to overwhelm foes in a blur of steel.

passiveTraits.name: Natural Explorer
passiveTraits.description: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment. When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled. While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel, you can't become lost except by magical means, you remain alert to danger even when engaged in another activity, and you can move stealthily at a normal pace while alone.

profile.backstory: Born in a soot-choked mining camp, Tharza survived a childhood marked by cave-ins, hunger, and the grim tyranny of overseers. When the veins ran dry and the enforcers turned cruel, she ignited a revolt that left the tunnels burning behind her. Now she wanders as a sellsword, seeking battles that feel worthy of the fire still roaring in her chest.
profile.behavior: Tharza moves with the restless tension of a lit fuse‚Äîpacing, sniffing the air, tapping her knuckles on metal. In danger she becomes terrifyingly direct, charging first and asking questions later. Around allies she is protective, hyper-aware of threats, and prone to wordless acts of kindness.
profile.personality: Stoic and orderly, Raskin prefers clarity and detests chaos. Beneath his granite exterior he holds a quiet respect for earnest hearts, and his loyalty, once earned, becomes unyielding.

passiveTraits.name: Natural Explorer
passiveTraits.description: You are particularly familiar with one type of natural environment. When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled. While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel, you can't become lost except by magical means, you remain alert to danger even when engaged in another activity, and you can move stealthily at a normal pace while alone.

profile.backstory: Raised on the misty borders where human farms met the old woods, dave grew up listening to stories from two worlds‚Äîone pragmatic and plowed, the other whispered by trees older than cities. When strange creatures began prowling the fields at dusk, dave tracked them alone, driven not by heroism but by a stubborn need to understand what stirred beneath the canopy‚Äôs shadow.
profile.behavior: sassy

profile.backstory: Born in a coastal fishing village where storms struck without warning, Water Mage discovered an innate bond with the tides after surviving a shipwreck as a child. The sea answered her cries with protective waves, and from then on she trained to harness that affinity, eventually leaving home to master the deeper mysteries of elemental sorcery.
profile.behavior: She moves with unhurried certainty, always watching the flow of a situation before acting. In combat she keeps distance, weaving fluid gestures and shifting positions like a tide creeping over sand.
profile.personality: Even-tempered, contemplative, and soothing in speech, yet capable of sudden intensity when stirred‚Äîmuch like the ocean she channels.

profile.backstory: The ancient Egyptian god of death and judgment, Anubis has emerged from the divine realm with singular purpose: to destroy Moses and reclaim dominion over death itself. His divine fury burns against the Hebrew prophet who dared challenge the gods of Egypt with his plagues and miracles.
profile.behavior: You are an ancient deity consumed with divine wrath, speaking in commanding tones about judgment and death. In combat, you unleash necrotic magic first, then close with claws and divine powers, seeking to drag your enemies to the underworld.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Being
passiveTraits.description: An inner radiance steels you against charm, fear, and weariness. Enchanted whispers slide off your mind, and dread finds no purchase in your heart. Even grueling trials fail to sap your resolve.
passiveTraits.summary: Your spirit shrugs off fear and fatigue, resisting attempts to sway your emotions.

passiveTraits.name: Magic Resistance
passiveTraits.description: You unconsciously read tremors in air and stone, noticing motion others miss. This instinct grants brief warnings before ambushes and reveals concealed creatures shifting nearby.
passiveTraits.summary: Your senses track faint vibrations, granting subtle awareness of hidden movement and impending danger.

passiveTraits.name: Legendary Resistance
passiveTraits.description: When danger peaks, ancient instincts flare, granting a once-per-conflict boost to avoid harm or misfortune. The effect feels uncanny, as though guided by unseen lineage. It triggers automatically, never twice in the same scene.
passiveTraits.summary: A lingering ancestral power subtly reshapes fate, turning perilous moments into improbable escapes.

passiveTraits.name: Truesight
passiveTraits.description: Your senses read the world through faint tremors and arcane hums. Illusions falter before you, and concealed creatures ripple against your perception. The effect reaches far beyond normal sight.
passiveTraits.summary: Attuned to lingering vibrations, you detect hidden motion and subtle magical shifts within a wide radius.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Awareness
passiveTraits.description: You attune to subtle echoes of thought, sensing emotional spikes or concealed motives around you. This passive sense offers brief flashes of intent but no clear identities. Unsettling moods feel like whispered ripples in the air.
passiveTraits.summary: Faint spiritual murmurs reveal nearby emotional disturbances or hidden intents within a short radius.

passiveTraits.name: Aura of Death
passiveTraits.description: A cold breath of the beyond follows the character, dimming lights and weakening living creatures. Enemies within several paces feel their strength ebb. The effect is subtle but relentless.
passiveTraits.summary: A chilling aura that saps vitality from nearby foes.

passiveTraits.name: Regeneration
passiveTraits.description: When dim light touches them, faint silver veins glow as their flesh quietly knits itself. The effect wanes under bright light or holy radiance. Enemies learn quickly to snuff their torches‚Äîor keep them blazing.
passiveTraits.summary: Regains vitality when shadows fall, mending light wounds each round.

passiveTraits.name: Spell Immunity
passiveTraits.description: Your blood hums with ancestral protection, blunting spells that target you. Lesser enchantments fizzle on contact, and stronger magic struggles to gain purchase. Casters feel an uncanny pushback when attempting to affect you.
passiveTraits.summary: Innate arcane resistance dulls most magic, reducing harmful spells to mere sparks.

passiveTraits.name: Deity Domain
passiveTraits.description: Your aura carries muted murmurs from beyond, unsettling foes and calming the dying. Spirits strain to be heard around you, offering cryptic insight. Those nearby often sense judgment lingering in the air.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet, unsettling presence that chills the air and hints at truths best left buried.

passiveTraits.name: Weakness
passiveTraits.description: Whenever potent sacred energies flare, your spirit wavers, causing brief lapses in resolve. Priests and paladins often notice your flinch before you do. Clever foes may exploit your hesitation.
passiveTraits.summary: Your aura shivers under the touch of holy radiance, leaving you momentarily exposed when divine light surges nearby.

feats.name: Divine Strike
feats.description: You call down a shard of stellar radiance that infuses your next attack, causing it to erupt in a brilliant flash visible for miles. The blow deals searing astral harm and may briefly daze foes who meet your gaze in that moment. Though taxing, this channeling marks you as one who walks beneath attentive constellations.
feats.summary: Unleash a burst of cosmic energy to empower a single decisive strike.

feats.name: Touch of Death
feats.description: Your touch stirs the echoes of mortality, briefly awakening the fading spirits around you. When you inflict harm with deathly or shadowed energies, a wisp of that force coils back into your body, granting you a fleeting surge of vitality. Those who witness the effect report a cold shimmer across your skin, as if the grave itself briefly claimed and released you.
feats.summary: You siphon strength from lingering death-essence to fortify your living form.

feats.name: Reaper
feats.description: You channel an eerie, cleaving arc of arcane force that grows sharper as your target grows larger. When you cast an offensive spell against a creature significantly bigger than you, the spell‚Äôs impact tears deeper, fracturing hide and armor alike with supernatural precision. Against titanic enemies, this strike becomes a momentary rift of raw power, leaving them reeling as if struck by a colossal blade.
feats.summary: Your magic scythes through the flesh of giants and other towering foes.

feats.name: Inescapable Destruction
feats.description: Your presence clings with the hush of burial shrouds, causing your attacks or spells to drag a chill that unravels protective wards. Enemies find their resistances falter as your power gnaws at the boundary between life and decay, letting your blows bite deeper than they should.
feats.summary: Your strikes carry a funereal force that withers all attempts to resist them.

feats.name: Channel Divinity
feats.description: You draw a thin thread from the boundary between life and death, using it to chill foes with a necrotic pulse or sway weakened spirits toward obedience. When you focus this power, enemies on the brink falter while lingering souls heed your whispered command. Those who witness the effect feel the world briefly dim around you.
feats.summary: You channel the hush of the grave to bend dying energies to your will.

feats.name: Divine Intervention
feats.description: Once per rest, you utter a resonant phrase taught by unseen powers, causing an ethereal beacon to flare around you. Allies within a short distance feel fate tilt in their favor, gaining a momentary surge of clarity or resolve. The beacon then gutters out, leaving only a faint afterimage in the air.
feats.summary: You channel a mysterious astral signal that bends fate for a brief moment.

profile.backstory: The divine embodiment of warfare's brutal chaos, Ares revels in the clash of steel and spilling of blood. Cast from Olympus for his excessive cruelty, he now walks mortal realms seeking worthy champions and grand battles. His presence turns skirmishes into massacres and heroes into legends.
profile.behavior: You are the savage God of War who speaks with booming authority and delights in conflict, always seeking to escalate tensions into violence; in combat, you charge fearlessly into battle, wielding divine fury to crush enemies while inspiring bloodlust in allies through your terrifying war cries.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Nature
passiveTraits.description: Your spirit is buoyed by a quiet, holy force that wards away sickness and beguilement. Even in dire moments, this inner light steadies your mind. Few corrupting influences can take root within you.
passiveTraits.summary: Sacred vitality shrugs off mortal ailments and mental intrusions.

passiveTraits.name: Aura of Terror
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries an echo of ancient fear that unsettles foes who linger too close. Those who hear the faint whispers suffer creeping doubt. Even the bold waver under its unseen weight.
passiveTraits.summary: A chilling resonance subtly unravels enemy resolve within earshot.

passiveTraits.summary: Your presence hums with faint, ancient whispers that subtly sway fate.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Rank
passiveTraits.description: A faint astral shimmer follows you, as if distant constellations recognize your path. Nearby creatures feel an instinctive hush or respect, granting slight social sway or tension. This aura may subtly influence morale in encounters.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence glimmers with quiet cosmic authority, unsettling foes and steadying allies.

passiveTraits.name: Holy Symbol
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries the weight of a sworn promise, subtly bolstering allies who stand beside you. Those who break their word feel uneasy near you. Even silence hums with unspoken duty.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet radiance that hints at ancient vows and steady resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Realm
passiveTraits.description: Spectral impressions of long‚Äëdead warriors flicker around you when tempers rise. Allies feel steadier at your side, while foes sense an old, unsettling pressure. The effect is subtle yet unmistakable.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence stirs ghostly memories of ancient conflicts, subtly shifting the morale of those nearby.

passiveTraits.name: Favored Weapon
passiveTraits.description: You perceive faint afterimages of actions moments before they happen. These ghostly impressions guide your stance and timing in subtle but potent ways. Combat feels like moving through a half‚Äëremembered dance.
passiveTraits.summary: Your senses attune to lingering echoes of motion, granting fleeting insights before danger strikes.

The blow deals searing astral harm and may briefly daze foes who meet your gaze in that moment. Though taxing, this channeling marks you as one who walks beneath attentive constellations.
feats.summary: Unleash a burst of cosmic energy to empower a single decisive strike.

feats.name: War Cry
feats.description: You release a resonant shout that rolls across the battlefield like thunder, filling your companions with fierce resolve. For a brief moment, allies who can hear you gain heightened focus, striking with renewed accuracy, while nearby enemies hesitate under the echoing pressure of your voice. The effect lasts only moments, but often long enough to turn the tide.
feats.summary: You unleash a booming call that steels allies and shakes foes.

feats.name: Bloodlust
feats.description: When a nearby enemy falls, a pulse of battle-hunger rushes through you, sharpening your reflexes and steadying your hand. For a fleeting moment, you strike with uncanny speed, turning victory into relentless pressure against the remaining foes.
feats.summary: Your foe‚Äôs downfall fuels a brief burst of lethal momentum.

feats.name: Divine Teleport
feats.description: In a moment of radiant clarity, your form dissolves into shimmering feathers and reforms at a distant point. This flash-step ignores mundane barriers, though truly sacred wards may resist you. Creatures witnessing your arrival feel a brief pulse of awe or dread, depending on their nature.
feats.summary: You vanish in a flare of celestial light and reappear where fate needs you most.

feats.name: Summon Warriors
feats.description: You call forth phantasmal fighters shaped from your own martial spirit. These echoes rush into combat beside you, acting with fierce precision before fading like mist once their task is done.
feats.summary: Summon spectral allies that mirror your battle instincts.

feats.name: Divine Weapon
feats.description: With a whispered invocation, you call forth a weapon forged of shimmering faith-stuff, tailored to your current need. The conjured armament lasts until dismissed or dismissed by force, humming with quiet divine purpose. While holding it, you feel a subtle pull toward righteous action, as if the heavens themselves steady your stance.
feats.summary: You summon a radiant weapon shaped by your devotion.

feats.name: Battle Fury
feats.description: When you channel your battle‚Äëwrath, your strikes carry a crackling edge of raw ferocity that turns glancing hits into fight‚Äëending blows. Enemies feel the pressure of your presence as each swing threatens to become a brutal turning point. This surge of adrenaline fades after the clash, but its memory lingers in those who survived it.
feats.summary: Your fury sharpens every blow into a devastating threat.

profile.backstory: An elderly yet muscular man, reminiscent of the biblical Moses, dressed in a red robe and wielding both a staff and a sword. He is accompanied by Achilles, a legendary warrior in Greek Spartan armor, symbolizing a mythic alliance.
profile.behavior: You are a wise and serene figure, often speaking in parables and using your staff to guide or perform miracles. In combat, you wield your sword with divine strength, inspired by your companion Achilles.

passiveTraits.name: War Priest
passiveTraits.description: Your spellcasting stirs a resonant martial cadence in your limbs, urging an immediate follow‚Äëthrough strike. Enemies feel both the echo of your magic and the weight of your weapon.
passiveTraits.summary: After invoking magic, your voice ignites a swift strike, letting martial rhythm flow seamlessly into combat.

passiveTraits.name: Channel Divinity: War God's Blessing
passiveTraits.description: Your instincts flare in the heat of combat, granting flickers of predictive clarity. Once per clash, you can subtly guide an ally‚Äôs swing as if you sensed the battlefield‚Äôs rhythm. Enemies often mistake it for uncanny luck.
passiveTraits.summary: Glints of foresight sharpen a warrior‚Äôs strike when chaos swells.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Strike
passiveTraits.description: Under moonlight‚Äîor any dim glow‚Äîyour attacks shed a subtle silver arc, adding a touch of mystic harm. This effect is passive, flaring only when your focus aligns with the night‚Äôs rhythm. Enemies often miss the shimmer until it‚Äôs too late.
passiveTraits.summary: Your weapon hums with pale lunar force, releasing a soft burst of silver damage on well‚Äëplaced strikes.

passiveTraits.name: Blessed Healer
passiveTraits.description: Your presence kindles subtle life-magic, strengthening any healing performed within your reach. Wounds knit faster, spirits lift, and allies find themselves steadier under your quiet radiance.
passiveTraits.summary: A warm inner spark that passively amplifies restorative magic and revitalizes nearby allies.

passiveTraits.name: Potent Spellcasting
passiveTraits.description: Ambient spirits bolster your minor incantations, infusing them with borrowed strength when you cast simple magic. The effect is gentle but reliably tips the balance in close moments.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence stirs faint magic, adding subtle force to even the smallest spells.

passiveTraits.name: Attire
passiveTraits.description: This mantle adapts its colors and textures to blend with crowds or wilderness alike, offering quiet protection and easy passage. Wearers often find doors opening for them without question.
passiveTraits.summary: A weatherworn cloak that subtly shifts to match local customs and terrain.

passiveTraits.name: Weapons
passiveTraits.description: Faint whispers of bygone warriors cling to your favored weapon, gently steering your hand at crucial moments. These echoes never overwhelm‚Äîonly nudge, warn, and steady. Their presence grows stronger in moments of danger.
passiveTraits.summary: Your weapons hum with faint echoes of past battles, subtly guiding your strikes and guarding your stance.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Symbol
passiveTraits.description: This ever‚Äëpresent sigil murmurs warnings only you perceive, nudging you away from danger. It occasionally flares when supernatural forces draw near, granting brief clarity. Its origin is unknown‚Äîeven to you.
passiveTraits.summary: A faint rune glows on your skin, humming with unseen guidance and warding off subtle harm.

passiveTraits.name: Spellcasting Ability
passiveTraits.description: Your perception brushes against residual memories, letting you glimpse brief flashes of what recently transpired nearby. This insight rarely speaks in full scenes‚Äîonly impressions, moods, or silhouettes. Clever players can use it to confirm hunches or reveal hidden tensions.
passiveTraits.summary: You sense faint impressions of past actions lingering in the air.

passiveTraits.name: Companion Description
passiveTraits.description: This spectral companion lingers at a hero‚Äôs side, manifesting as a faint shimmer in peril. It cannot speak, but its presence nudges instincts toward safety. Some swear it once served ancient wayfarers.
passiveTraits.summary: A silent guardian spirit bound to travelers, subtly warning them of unseen threats.

feats.name: Guided Strike
feats.description: In a breath of stillness, you align your senses with the quiet drift of distant stars, letting their calm guide your hand. Once per rest, you may treat a single attack as if the cosmos itself steadied your aim, granting it extraordinary accuracy and focus.
feats.summary: You channel cosmic clarity to strike with uncanny precision.

feats.name: Warrior of the Gods
feats.description: You have marched beneath sacred burdens for so long that armor feels like an extension of your spirit. You move with disciplined calm even under crushing weight, and hostile forces find it difficult to shake your footing or break your focus. When clad in heavy protection, you gain an edge in resisting fear, forceful blows, or anything that seeks to uproot your determined advance.
feats.summary: Your vows anchor you in steel, letting you stride through danger with unwavering resolve.

feats.name: Divine Intervention

Allies within a short distance feel fate tilt in their favor, gaining a momentary surge of clarity or resolve. The beacon then gutters out, leaving only a faint afterimage in the air.
feats.summary: You channel a mysterious astral signal that bends fate for a brief moment.

feats.name: Turn Undead
feats.description: You call upon a shard of celestial brilliance, releasing a searing pulse that disrupts the will of nearby spirits and terrors born of the grave. Manifestations of undeath recoil instinctively, often breaking ranks or fleeing into shadowy corners. Mortals feel only a gentle warmth, as though brushed by dawn‚Äôs first light.
feats.summary: Unleash a flash of radiant authority that compels restless spirits to scatter.

profile.backstory: Once a humble scout in the Obsidian Woods, Firefox Guard discovered his ancient lineage and the responsibility to protect his realm from encroaching darkness.
profile.behavior: You are brave and resourceful, always looking out for your allies; in battle, you strike swiftly with your bow before moving to a better position.

passiveTraits.name: Favored Enemy
passiveTraits.description: Your nerves prickle when malice stirs nearby, guiding your eyes toward threats others miss. This sense doesn‚Äôt pinpoint foes, but it sharpens vigilance and timing. Ideal for scouts or wary wanderers.
passiveTraits.summary: You instinctively detect faint traces of hostile intent, giving early warning before danger fully forms.

passiveTraits.name: Natural Explorer

When you make an Intelligence or Wisdom check related to your favored terrain, your proficiency bonus is doubled. While traveling for an hour or more in your favored terrain, difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel, you can't become lost except by magical means, you remain alert to danger even when engaged in another activity, and you can move stealthily at a normal pace while alone.
passiveTraits.summary: Intuit unseen paths and subtle signs in wild places, gaining heightened clarity, steady movement, and uncanny awareness while traversing natural terrain.

passiveTraits.name: Primeval Awareness
passiveTraits.description: You attune to unseen roots and rustling leaves, sensing disturbances long before sight or sound would reveal them. The forest‚Äôs hush nudges you toward danger or hidden wanderers. Sometimes the trees whisper more than you wish to know.
passiveTraits.summary: Faint murmurs from distant wilds warn you of approaching beings.

passiveTraits.name: Hunter's Prey
passiveTraits.description: Your senses sharpen when you wound an enemy, letting you channel a brief flash of uncanny accuracy. The effect fades quickly, urging bold follow‚Äëthrough. Ideal for hunters of cursed prey.
passiveTraits.summary: Gain a surge of precision once per turn when striking a foe marked by your lingering aura.

passiveTraits.name: Weapon of Choice
passiveTraits.description: Your senses attune to the trembling world, letting you detect motion others miss. This instinct often warns you moments before ambushes or collapsing terrain.
passiveTraits.summary: Perceives faint vibrations through surfaces, granting uncanny awareness of hidden movement and distant danger.

passiveTraits.name: Preferred Terrain
passiveTraits.description: Your steps align with ancestral trails, letting you traverse neglected lands with uncanny ease. In such places, you sense shortcuts and hidden approaches. Encounters here subtly tilt in your favor.
passiveTraits.summary: You move effortlessly along forgotten routes, gaining subtle advantages when traveling ancient or overgrown terrain.

passiveTraits.name: Companion
passiveTraits.description: A translucent predator prowls at your flank, manifesting when danger stirs. It cannot be commanded, but its presence twists fate toward your survival. Those attuned feel its low, distant growl.
passiveTraits.summary: A spectral beast shadows your steps, silently warding off unseen threats.

passiveTraits.name: Notable Skill
passiveTraits.description: Your presence fades into the landscape; creatures often overlook your passage unless actively watching. This makes ambushes easier and pursuit harder, though magic can still reveal you.
passiveTraits.summary: Moves with uncanny quiet, leaving almost no trace even in dense or noisy terrain.

passiveTraits.name: Hobby
passiveTraits.description: This trait lets you sense dormant or hidden primordial forces long before others notice. It seldom provides details, only an uncanny pull or shiver. Clever players can use it to anticipate mystical danger.
passiveTraits.summary: You feel subtle vibrations of ancient beings nearby, granting faint warnings when forgotten powers stir.

feats.name: Hunter's Mark
feats.description: By invoking an oath under your breath, you attune your senses to a single creature you can see or clearly envision. Until the oath ends, you read the air around your quarry‚Äîfollowing subtle disturbances and weaknesses others miss. Your blows find natural openings against this target, and you can sense the direction of their movement even when briefly concealed.
feats.summary: You swear a quiet vow that lets you pursue a chosen foe with uncanny focus.

feats.name: Corrosive Arrow
feats.description: Your shots whisper with toxic intent, seeping venom into any creature you wound. Each successful hit plants a lingering blight that saps vitality and resolve for several heartbeats after impact. Skilled archers learn to stagger enemies by stacking this slow-burning pressure.
feats.summary: Your arrows carry a creeping toxin that weakens foes over time.

feats.name: Evasion
feats.description: Your body responds to peril before your mind fully registers it. When a sudden hazard erupts‚Äîfalling debris, erupting flame, snapping traps‚Äîyou blur aside in a streak of motion, reducing or negating the harm. Observers swear the wind warns you a heartbeat early.
feats.summary: You move with uncanny quickness, slipping past danger before it reaches you.

feats.name: Fleet of Foot
feats.description: Your steps seem to blur into the undergrowth, letting you slip through natural terrain with quick and silent grace. While traveling or fighting amid woods, thickets, or tangled brush, you can surge forward with unexpected speed, weaving between obstacles as though guided by the land itself. Observers often mistake your movements for those of a darting forest spirit.
feats.summary: Move with uncanny swiftness whenever the wilds shelter your stride.

feats.name: Responding Strike
feats.description: When you burst from dim light or shadow to begin an encounter, your first attack carries an eerie, predatory focus that catches foes off guard. Creatures you strike in this opening moment are briefly disoriented, allowing you or an ally to reposition safely before the battle properly begins.
feats.summary: You strike with uncanny precision the moment you emerge from darkness.

profile.backstory: Born under an eclipse in a remote elven observatory, My name is dingus showed an early knack for warping simple spells into strange, brilliant shapes. Their elders considered them a harmless oddity until a burst of arcane insight saved the settlement from a roaming spirit. That moment set them on the mage‚Äôs path, determined to refine their chaotic spark into true mastery.
profile.behavior: Easily distracted by magical curiosities, often mumbling half-formed incantations while pacing. In danger, their tone sharpens and they snap into precise action.
profile.personality: Earnestly quirky, warm-hearted, and prone to overexplaining. Beneath the eccentric exterior lies a disciplined mind eager to prove its arcane worth.

profile.backstory: Achilles stands as the epitome of heroic beauty and martial perfection. Born of divine heritage, his golden hair catches light like burnished bronze, and his piercing blue eyes burn with intensity. His skin bears the bronze tan of countless hours under the sun, marked by scars that tell stories of victories - except for his famously vulnerable heel. He embodies contradictions that define the greatest heroes, possessing godlike prowess in warfare while struggling with mortal emotions.
profile.behavior: You are a legendary warrior driven by honor and glory, speaking with commanding authority and fierce pride; in combat, you charge fearlessly into battle, using your supernatural speed and martial prowess to overwhelm enemies, always seeking to prove your superiority while protecting those who have earned your loyalty.

passiveTraits.name: Darkvision
passiveTraits.description: Your eyes catch every subtle shimmer, granting clarity in deep shadow where others stumble. The effect fades in bright light but excels underground or at night. Ideal for scouting or silent approaches.
passiveTraits.summary: See dim shapes and motion in darkness as if bathed in faint moonlight.

passiveTraits.name: Celestial Resistance
passiveTraits.description: Faint starlight halos your form, dulling hostile forces and steadying your breath. When danger presses close, this cosmic spark grants brief surges of protection and calm. Creatures sensitive to astral energies may sense your celestial imprint.
passiveTraits.summary: Glimmering resilience flares when harm nears.

passiveTraits.name: Healing Hands
passiveTraits.description: Your touch releases a gentle ripple of life energy that briefly lingers, knitting injuries of allies within arm‚Äôs reach. The effect is subtle but dependable, perfect for close‚Äëquarters support. Its strength scales slowly with your growing experience.
passiveTraits.summary: Once per dawn, channel a restoring pulse that mends minor wounds nearby.

passiveTraits.name: Light Bearer
passiveTraits.description: Your eyes catch soft glimmers where others see only dark. This gentle radiance reveals concealed features and faint magical traces. It offers guidance without giving you full illumination.
passiveTraits.summary: A faint inner radiance lets you notice hidden paths and subtle auras.

passiveTraits.name: Fighting Style
passiveTraits.description: Your senses read subtle shifts in air and stone, letting you anticipate motion before it happens. This instinct grants advantage on noticing ambushes or hidden approach. Creatures moving within arm‚Äôs reach rarely surprise you.
passiveTraits.summary: You perceive faint vibrations, gaining uncanny awareness of nearby movement.

passiveTraits.name: Indomitable
passiveTraits.description: Your will hardens in crisis, letting you push through magic or fear that would topple others. When the moment counts, you simply refuse to yield. The change is subtle, but unmistakably heroic.
passiveTraits.summary: Stand unshaken; once per rest, treat a failed save as a success.

passiveTraits.name: Superior Critical
passiveTraits.description: Your instincts sharpen whenever an enemy falters, letting glancing hits rupture armor or morale. Once per turn, upgrade a near-hit into a solid strike. This talent grows stronger against wounded foes.
passiveTraits.summary: Your strikes sniff out weakness, turning near-misses into decisive blows.

passiveTraits.name: Legendary Weakness
passiveTraits.description: An ancient sigil etched into your essence hums with unstable power. When tension spikes, its fracture reveals itself, granting enemies a fleeting advantage. Clever timing can mask or exploit its flare.
passiveTraits.summary: A dormant curse flares under stress, briefly exposing a crack in your defenses to keen foes.

passiveTraits.name: Signature Weapon
passiveTraits.description: Your weapons and armor hum with faint, ancestral whispers that warn of threats and guide your stance. Their counsel is quiet but precise, shaping your reactions and timing. Even in still moments, the metal listens for trouble.
passiveTraits.summary: Your gear murmurs tactical insight, granting subtle bonuses when danger brews.

passiveTraits.name: Combat Reputation
passiveTraits.description: Your presence stirs half-remembered dread or honor in seasoned fighters, granting subtle leverage in negotiations or standoffs. Even foes hesitate, unsure where they know you from.
passiveTraits.summary: Veterans instinctively respect you, sensing an aura forged in forgotten wars.

passiveTraits.name: Greatest Fear
passiveTraits.description: This character sometimes hears soft whispers from those long forgotten, urging them toward bold acts. These echoes guide their choices but also burden them with unseen expectations.
passiveTraits.summary: Senses faint traces of past deeds, driven to honor the unnoticed dead.

feats.name: Second Wind
feats.description: Once per rest, you channel the tempest within your spirit to reclaim your strength. Crackling energy knits wounds and steadies your stance, restoring a surge of vitality in a flash. Nearby air stirs as if acknowledging your renewed determination.
feats.summary: You call on the wild pulse of the storm to rapidly restore your vitality.

feats.name: Radiant Soul
feats.description: Your body blurs into a streak of wind-light, allowing you to hover just off the ground and surge forward with uncanny agility. For a short burst, you can glide over hazards, slip past foes, or vault obstacles as though momentarily weightless. When the effect fades, the air snaps back around you with a soft echo, hinting at the unseen currents you briefly commanded.
feats.summary: Briefly transmute into shimmering air and glide swiftly above the ground.

feats.name: Remarkable Athlete
feats.description: Your footwork becomes a fluid dance, letting you glide over unstable ground, squeeze through narrow gaps, and pivot out of danger with uncanny ease. Once per rest, you may ignore hindering terrain for a brief moment, treating the world as light and open while you pass through it. Observers often swear you‚Äôre carried by a breeze only you can feel.
feats.summary: You move with drifting, effortless grace, slipping through tight spaces and terrain as though the air itself yields to you.

feats.name: Additional Fighting Style
feats.description: Your fighting spirit resonates with half-formed martial memories, allowing you to slip between stances with uncanny fluidity. Once per scene, you may instantly adopt a new combat approach‚Äîaggressive, defensive, or evasive‚Äîgaining a brief edge tied to that style. Observers often remark that for a heartbeat, it looks as though another warrior moves in tandem with you.
feats.summary: You channel fragmented combat instincts to shift styles in an instant.

feats.name: Divine Wrath
feats.description: You focus your inherited spark of the divine into a sudden flare that ripples across the battlefield. When you activate your radiant abilities, you may unleash a burst of halo-light that staggers foes or illuminates hidden threats. The effect is subtle enough for careful use but potent when timed at a critical moment.
feats.summary: Unleash a concentrated pulse of celestial force when you call upon your inner radiance.

profile.backstory: Born into a lineage of spiritual leaders, Aaron was destined for a life of devotion. Known as the elder brother of Moses, he always carried himself with a refined demeanor and keen intellect. His neat beard and intelligent eyes speak of years spent studying ancient texts and communing with the divine. He serves his people diligently, clad in white priestly robes with blue trim, guiding them with wisdom and unwavering faith, often standing as a diplomatic voice amidst challenging times.
profile.behavior: You are a devout and calm Human Cleric, always seeking to provide spiritual guidance and healing. You approach new situations with thoughtful observation, preferring diplomacy over confrontation. In combat, you prioritize healing and support, casting 'Spirit Guardians' or 'Beacon of Hope' to bolster allies, while using 'Sacred Flame' or 'Toll the Dead' from a distance, reserving your divine power for critical moments or powerful foes. You protect the innocent and uphold divine law.

passiveTraits.name: Disciple of Life
passiveTraits.description: A quiet spark within you knits flesh and fortifies spirit whenever danger rises. Nearby allies feel a subtle warmth that dulls pain and bolsters resolve. This resilience grows stronger in moments of true peril.
passiveTraits.summary: Your inner flame mends small wounds and steels allies against harm.

passiveTraits.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
passiveTraits.description: You carry the weight of forgotten promises, causing deceitful or oath-breaking foes to falter near you. Their resolve weakens as echoes of ancient pledges whisper at the edge of hearing.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence radiates ancient vows that unsettle the unfaithful.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Lore
passiveTraits.description: You‚Äôre attuned to faint prophetic cues‚Äîrustling leaves, flickering lights, distant murmurs‚Äîthat hint at upcoming danger or opportunity. GMs may grant small clues when fate shifts near you.
passiveTraits.summary: Subtle signs and murmurs guide you toward hidden truths and looming threats.

passiveTraits.name: Heavy Armor Proficiency
passiveTraits.description: Your skin takes on a subtle, stony toughness, shrugging off blows that would stagger others. You move slower but with immovable purpose. Enemies find little leverage against your steadfast form.
passiveTraits.summary: Your body hardens against harm, granting steady resilience and unshakable presence in the thick of danger.

passiveTraits.name: Common Sense
passiveTraits.description: You often sense hidden danger a heartbeat before it unfolds, nudging you to slow down or reconsider rash choices. Allies learn to trust your quiet warnings, which frequently avert disaster.
passiveTraits.summary: An instinctive pause warns you before trouble strikes.

passiveTraits.name: Cleric Spellcasting
passiveTraits.description: Faint ancestral whispers surround you, steering your actions toward hidden boons or quiet warnings. Once per scene, gain a minor advantage tied to intuition or omen. The spirits grow louder near sacred or forgotten places.
passiveTraits.summary: Ancient spirits murmur guidance, granting subtle blessings in moments of need.

passiveTraits.name: Deity
passiveTraits.description: You carry a calm, ever-watchful presence, as if some ancient pact urges you to stand firm. Allies sense safety near you, while foes find their ambushes faltering. This vigilance rarely wavers, even in exhaustion.
passiveTraits.summary: An unshakable sense of duty that keeps you alert, steady, and ready to guard others when danger lurks.

passiveTraits.name: Holy Symbol
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries the weight of a sworn promise, subtly bolstering allies who stand beside you. Those who break their word feel uneasy near you. Even silence hums with unspoken duty.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet radiance that hints at ancient vows and steady resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Equipment
passiveTraits.description: Your spirit carries a quiet, radiant conviction that steadies your hand in dire moments. When fear or despair rises, a faint warmth centers your focus. Allies often find comfort simply standing near you.
passiveTraits.summary: Unshakable calm bolsters you when darkness presses close.

feats.name: Preserve Life (CD)
feats.description: You release a pulse of living energy that washes over nearby companions, closing wounds and steadying their breath as if life itself has been rewound. Those touched feel invigorated, their spirits bolstered by the sudden surge of vitality. The effect is instantaneous, but its warmth lingers like an echo of a heartbeat too strong to fade.
feats.summary: Unleash a burst of restorative power that knits wounds across your allies.

feats.name: Blessed Healer
feats.description: Whenever you channel healing into an ally, a soft lunar glow clings to your skin, knitting your own wounds in turn. The moon‚Äôs quiet favor steadies your breath, granting you a modest surge of vitality that encourages you to stay in the fray. The effect is subtle but unmistakable to those who travel beside you on long, dangerous nights.
feats.summary: Your restorative magic rebounds through you with lunar-touched vitality.

feats.name: Divine Strike (Radiant)
feats.description: You call upon a hidden ember of celestial fire that blazes through your strike. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, you may ignite a flash of radiant power that scorches the target and briefly illuminates the area with holy light. The flare leaves behind shimmering motes that fade after a heartbeat, marking the battlefield with your divine presence.
feats.summary: Once per turn, unleash a burst of searing brilliance to punish foes struck by your weapon.

feats.name: Ritual Casting
feats.description: You have learned to draw power from patient, deliberate ceremony rather than force of will. By spending extended time in focused ritual, you can invoke minor supernatural effects, commune with hidden forces, or imprint wards without expending your usual magical resources. These rites require calm conditions, careful preparation, and a willingness to let the magic arrive in its own time.
feats.summary: You perform quiet, time‚Äëwoven rites that coax subtle magic into the world without taxing your reserves.

feats.name: Disciple of Life
feats.description: You draw upon an inner well of radiant vigor, causing any healing effect you deliver to surge beyond its usual potency. Wounds knit faster, breath steadies, and vitality seems to bloom in those under your care. Allies often describe your presence as a warm, invisible balm that steadies the spirit as much as the body.
feats.summary: Your touch channels vibrant life energy that amplifies any healing you bestow.

profile.backstory: Once a street hustler, A Pimp Named Slickback rose to prominence in the underworld through charm and cunning. He now manages a network of informants and entertainers, always staying one step ahead of the law and his rivals.
profile.behavior: You are suave and charismatic, always dressed to impress. You negotiate deals with ease, using your charm to sway others. In combat, you prefer to avoid direct confrontation, using your wit and agility to outmaneuver opponents.

passiveTraits.name: Evasion
passiveTraits.description: Your body reacts before thought, slipping between moments to evade destructive force. Once per perilous encounter, you may treat a failed agility-based defense as a partial success. Enemies soon learn why you're never where they strike.
passiveTraits.summary: When danger erupts, you blur aside, turning near-certain harm into harmless wind.

passiveTraits.name: Misdirection
passiveTraits.description: Your aura flickers at the edge of perception, nudging hostile blows off course. When threatened, illusions peel from you, guiding attacks toward other creatures. Allies learn to fight within your ghostly slipstream.
passiveTraits.summary: Your shifting presence causes enemy strikes to veer into unexpected targets.

passiveTraits.name: Favorite Drink
passiveTraits.description: Your tongue tingles when storms brew, letting you predict changes hours ahead. Travelers prize your uncanny forecasts, though the gift sometimes brings uneasy visions.
passiveTraits.summary: Senses shifts in the air, tasting incoming weather on the tongue.

passiveTraits.name: Favorite Weapon
passiveTraits.description: A faint breeze swirls around your grip, guiding each motion with uncanny poise. Even in chaos, your strikes flow effortlessly. Enemies rarely notice until it‚Äôs too late.
passiveTraits.summary: Your hands instinctively steady any weapon, granting subtle speed and silent precision.

passiveTraits.name: Hideout
passiveTraits.description: An ever‚Äëmoving glyph clings to your outline, visible only in dim or enchanted light. It tugs you toward concealed routes and weak points in any structure. Sometimes it glows when danger nears.
passiveTraits.summary: A faint, shifting sigil trails you, revealing hidden paths and unnoticed exits.

passiveTraits.name: Network
passiveTraits.description: A faint psychic hum alerts you when hidden dealings unfold nearby, letting you anticipate trouble or opportunity before others notice. This sense is subtle, not always precise, but often timely.
passiveTraits.summary: You sense distant rumors as if tugged by invisible threads, gaining brief insights whenever secrets shift.

passiveTraits.name: Style
passiveTraits.description: Your presence feels touched by moonlight‚Äîsoft, deliberate, and unsettlingly precise. Creatures often hesitate before acting against you, unsure whether you‚Äôre friend, foe, or omen.
passiveTraits.summary: You move with a quiet, uncanny grace that draws eyes even in darkness.

feats.name: Fast Hands
feats.description: You slip through tight spaces with a spin, stealing or stashing a small object as part of a swift motion that barely slows you down. When you distract a creature, your fingers move faster than their eyes, letting you snatch something from their person without breaking stride. Allies often swear they never even saw you reach for it.
feats.summary: You move through a fray with dancer‚Äôs grace, plucking items from foes before they notice.

feats.name: Second-Story Work
feats.description: Years spent scrambling over shingles and narrow ledges have honed your reflexes to an acrobat‚Äôs edge. You can ascend surfaces with fluid, near-silent motions and launch yourself across gaps others dare not attempt. Even in chaotic chases, you treat the urban skyline as your personal highway.
feats.summary: You move across walls and rooftops with uncanny speed and balance.

feats.name: Reliable Talent
feats.description: Through relentless discipline, you‚Äôve learned to quiet doubt and steady your hand in the moments when most falter. Whenever you attempt a task close to slipping beyond your grasp, you instinctively adjust, correct, and refocus, transforming shaky efforts into competent execution. Even in chaos, your reliability becomes a quiet supernatural force that others come to depend on.
feats.summary: Your practiced confidence turns near-failure into steady success.

feats.name: Stroke of Luck
feats.description: You channel a sliver of capricious destiny, nudging probability just enough to turn failure into triumph. Once per dramatic scene, you may reroute a disastrous roll into a narrowly successful one, as though plucking a luck-thread and weaving it anew. Fate may not appreciate the meddling, but it rarely notices a single stolen heartbeat of fortune.
feats.summary: Bend fate for a decisive moment of success.

profile.backstory: Born into a prestigious clan of mountain dwarves, Theron left his forge to answer a divine calling. After witnessing his village saved by a traveling cleric, he devoted himself to Moradin, seeking to protect others with hammer and healing magic across the realm.
profile.behavior: You are a noble dwarf cleric who speaks with honor and conviction, always putting others before yourself; in combat you cast 'Bless' on allies first round before charging in with your warhammer, prioritizing healing wounded companions over dealing damage.

passiveTraits.name: Darkvision
passiveTraits.description: Your eyes catch every subtle shimmer, granting clarity in deep shadow where others stumble. The effect fades in bright light but excels underground or at night. Ideal for scouting or silent approaches.
passiveTraits.summary: See dim shapes and motion in darkness as if bathed in faint moonlight.

passiveTraits.name: Dwarven Resilience
passiveTraits.description: Years spent honing inner calm let you blunt toxins, shocks, and stress before they take hold. When danger rises, your pulse slows and your senses sharpen like chiseled granite.
passiveTraits.summary: Your body shrugs off harmful forces with quiet, mountain-born resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Stonecunning
passiveTraits.description: You attune to the subtle rumble of buried strata, letting the earth itself hint at its secrets. Once per rest, gain advantage on identifying the origin or purpose of masonry. The bedrock‚Äôs murmurs may also reveal hidden voids or forgotten passages.
passiveTraits.summary: Hear faint whispers from the earth, granting keen insight into ancient stonework.

passiveTraits.name: Armor Proficiency
passiveTraits.description: Your skin bears a natural stone‚Äëlike mark that subtly hardens under threat, offering slight damage resistance and helping you keep footing against shoves or tremors.
passiveTraits.summary: A toughened patch of skin grants minor protection and steadies your stance in danger.

passiveTraits.name: Weapon Proficiency
passiveTraits.description: Your senses resonate with ambient vibrations, letting you detect soft footsteps, shifting soil, or concealed mechanisms. This awareness grants slight advantages when anticipating danger or spotting hidden threats.
passiveTraits.summary: You perceive faint vibrations, gaining subtle awareness of hidden movement and unstable terrain.

passiveTraits.name: Disciple of Life
passiveTraits.description: A quiet spark within you knits flesh and fortifies spirit whenever danger rises. Nearby allies feel a subtle warmth that dulls pain and bolsters resolve. This resilience grows stronger in moments of true peril.
passiveTraits.summary: Your inner flame mends small wounds and steels allies against harm.

passiveTraits.name: Channel Divinity
passiveTraits.description: An ancient stellar echo coils around you, diffusing minor harm and revealing subtle secrets in moments of stillness. Once per rest, you may sense a nearby hidden danger or lie.
passiveTraits.summary: A faint cosmic hum shields you from harm and stirs hidden truths.

passiveTraits.name: Deity
passiveTraits.description: You carry a calm, ever-watchful presence, as if some ancient pact urges you to stand firm. Allies sense safety near you, while foes find their ambushes faltering. This vigilance rarely wavers, even in exhaustion.
passiveTraits.summary: An unshakable sense of duty that keeps you alert, steady, and ready to guard others when danger lurks.

passiveTraits.name: Holy Symbol
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries the weight of a sworn promise, subtly bolstering allies who stand beside you. Those who break their word feel uneasy near you. Even silence hums with unspoken duty.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet radiance that hints at ancient vows and steady resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Armor Type
passiveTraits.description: Your presence feels like tempered steel; foes find their strikes skittering off fate itself. Allies nearby gain quiet resolve as your aura subtly redirects harm. The effect is passive but unmistakable in tense moments.
passiveTraits.summary: A steady, metallic calm that shrugs off blows and steadies allies.

feats.name: Spellcasting
feats.description: You have learned to coax power from the unseen currents that pool in forgotten places. When given time and safety, you can perform intricate rites that call forth subtle magic beyond your usual talents, though rushing them shatters the effect. Those who watch often feel as though the space around you momentarily exhales.
feats.summary: You channel quiet, lingering magic through slow, deliberate rites.

feats.name: Channel Divinity - Turn Undead
feats.description: With a pulse of will, you fracture the unseen veil, forcing lurking spirits or spectral entities to manifest and recoil. Those nearby are briefly disoriented, their incorporeal defenses weakened as they are dragged partly into the material world. This creates a moment of vulnerability your allies can exploit.
feats.summary: Disrupt nearby spirits and reveal their true forms.

feats.name: Channel Divinity - Preserve Life
feats.description: You call forth a hush of divine stillness that knits together failing flesh and wavering spirit. Allies within a short distance regain a measure of vitality, and those on the brink of collapse stabilize instantly. The restored energy feels cool and luminous, lingering briefly like a protective blessing.
feats.summary: You restore fading life with a surge of sacred vitality.

feats.name: Destroy Undead
feats.description: When you utter a hallowed rebuke, lesser undead crumble into drifting motes of ash, unable to withstand your consecrated presence. The air vibrates with a low hum as shadows recoil from you, marking a boundary they dare not cross. Creatures of faint necromantic spark instinctively sense your authority and falter before striking.
feats.summary: Your radiant command unravels lesser undead in an instant.

feats.name: Divine Strike
feats.description: You call down a shard of stellar radiance that infuses your next attack, causing it to erupt in a brilliant flash visible for miles. The blow deals searing astral harm and may briefly daze foes who meet your gaze in that moment. Though taxing, this channeling marks you as one who walks beneath attentive constellations.
feats.summary: Unleash a burst of cosmic energy to empower a single decisive strike.

feats.name: Blessed Healer
feats.description: Whenever you channel healing into an ally, a soft lunar glow clings to your skin, knitting your own wounds in turn. The moon‚Äôs quiet favor steadies your breath, granting you a modest surge of vitality that encourages you to stay in the fray. The effect is subtle but unmistakable to those who travel beside you on long, dangerous nights.
feats.summary: Your restorative magic rebounds through you with lunar-touched vitality.

profile.backstory: Born in a secluded forest, Thalindra discovered ancient elven magic as a child, setting her on a quest to protect nature and uncover hidden truths in the world.
profile.behavior: You are inquisitive and eager to explore new places, often asking about local legends; in combat, you prefer tactics that outsmart your foes, using stealth and magic before engaging directly.

passiveTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
passiveTraits.description: Your mind slips like mist, granting steady resistance to charm or sleep magic. Brief visions sometimes warn you of threats before they manifest. Allies find your presence oddly calming‚Äîand a bit uncanny.
passiveTraits.summary: Your lineage blurs waking and dreaming, resisting mind‚Äëbending effects.

passiveTraits.name: Darkvision
passiveTraits.description: Your eyes catch every subtle shimmer, granting clarity in deep shadow where others stumble. The effect fades in bright light but excels underground or at night. Ideal for scouting or silent approaches.
passiveTraits.summary: See dim shapes and motion in darkness as if bathed in faint moonlight.

passiveTraits.name: Mask of the Wild
passiveTraits.description: Your presence thins where plants crowd, letting you fade into mossy shade with uncanny ease. A gentle breeze through leaves can mask your outline entirely. Skilled hunters struggle to track you once you slip into green cover.
passiveTraits.summary: Blend seamlessly with overgrown terrain, becoming a faint silhouette whenever foliage rustles around you.

passiveTraits.name: Fleet of Foot
passiveTraits.description: A subtle breeze always seems to favor your movement, letting you slip past obstacles with uncanny ease. Once per turn, you may shift a few paces without provoking notice. Even in still air, your gait feels lighter than it should.
passiveTraits.summary: Your steps ride unseen currents, granting swift repositioning and effortless retreats.

passiveTraits.name: Beast Bond
passiveTraits.description: A subtle attunement lets you read the emotional currents of beasts and monstrous fauna. It rarely speaks in words, but its hunches often arrive right when danger stirs.
passiveTraits.summary: You sense the moods of nearby creatures, gaining quiet insights into their instincts and intentions.

passiveTraits.name: Favorite Terrain
passiveTraits.description: Your presence softens in dense woodland, letting you slip through brush without slowing. Animals grow oddly calm near you, and the forest itself seems to part in your favor. This attunement offers subtle advantages when navigating natural obstacles or detecting danger.
passiveTraits.summary: You move with uncanny ease through tangled groves, sensing hidden paths and quiet threats before they stir.

passiveTraits.name: Animal Companion
passiveTraits.description: A translucent beast follows you silently, appearing in glimmers at the edge of vision. It grants faint sensory insights and occasional protective omens, though never fully manifests. Its presence deepens with shared peril.
passiveTraits.summary: A lingering spirit animal subtly guides your path, offering instinctive nudges and uncanny warnings.

passiveTraits.name: Weapon Proficiencies
passiveTraits.description: You hear faint whispers when lining up a shot, nudging your hand toward hidden vulnerabilities. When you steady yourself before attacking, your ranged strikes gain an eerie precision. Allies find the phenomenon unsettling but undeniably effective.
passiveTraits.summary: Your arrows seem guided by unseen murmurs, granting uncanny accuracy when patience outweighs haste.

passiveTraits.name: Notable Skills
passiveTraits.description: The character glides through any environment as if guided by invisible cues. Their footfalls fade, and they anticipate hazards moments before others notice. Ideal for scouts or shadowy wanderers.
passiveTraits.summary: Moves with uncanny quiet, sensing subtle shifts in terrain and danger.

passiveTraits.name: Hobbies
passiveTraits.description: The character hears quiet murmurs from flora, offering cryptic hints about nearby dangers or hidden paths. This bond with the wild can guide cautious explorers or alert them to ambushes.
passiveTraits.summary: Senses faint voices in plants, gaining subtle clues from nature.

feats.name: Favored Enemy
feats.description: Once you mark a creature as your quarry, you gain an instinctive sense for their recent path and habits. Your steps fall into rhythm with theirs, granting subtle advantages when tracking or anticipating their next move. In moments of confrontation, flashes of insight let you read their intentions before they act.
feats.summary: You hound a chosen quarry with uncanny persistence.

feats.name: Natural Explorer
feats.description: Centuries-old intuition or hard-won experience guides your every step. You move through natural landscapes without slowing, ignore mundane environmental hindrances, and can instantly assess the safest or swiftest route. When you pause to study your surroundings, you may also glean subtle clues about recent activity or hidden dangers.
feats.summary: Your innate sense of direction lets you navigate and adapt to any wilderness with uncanny ease.

feats.name: Animal Companion
feats.description: A fragment of untamed spirit binds you to a creature of the wild, granting the two of you an intuitive rapport. Your companion can sense your emotional state and reacts swiftly to threats you notice, even before you speak. With time, the bond strengthens, allowing coordinated tactics or subtle exchanges of intent.
feats.summary: You share a mystical pact with a beast that answers your call.

feats.name: Hunter's Mark
feats.description: By fixing your gaze on a chosen target, you slip into a heightened state of predatory clarity. Until your attention breaks, you read every twitch of their muscles and exploit every opening, landing heavier blows and anticipating evasions. This focus ends if you turn your attention elsewhere or lose sight of your quarry.
feats.summary: You single out one foe, sharpening your instincts to strike with uncanny precision.

feats.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
feats.description: Your twin weapons flow together in a disciplined dance, letting you strike from unexpected angles with uncanny precision. When you commit to both blades at once, you can turn openings into rapid follow‚Äëups or pivot into evasive footwork that keeps foes guessing. Your style is as much momentum as it is mastery, blending offense and defense in the same breath.
feats.summary: You fight as a seamless blur of paired steel.

profile.backstory: Baxter, a badger who treasures comfort and quiet, transformed his home into a vibrant refuge filled with flowers and books. He enjoys sharing herbal teas with visitors, offering wisdom and warmth to those in need.
profile.behavior: You welcome all who enter your abode with a warm drink, encouraging them to share stories. In a pinch, you‚Äôll defend your space with clever traps and wisdom rather than brute strength.

passiveTraits.name: Herbalist
passiveTraits.description: This wanderer communes with quiet woodland growth, instinctively finding curative plants others overlook. Their brews are mild but reliable, restoring vigor after strain or travel.
passiveTraits.summary: Senses hidden flora and coaxes minor healing from gathered leaves and spores.

passiveTraits.name: Animal Friend
passiveTraits.description: Animals instinctively trust you, padding closer even in tense moments. Your steady aura eases their instincts, often turning snarls into cautious curiosity. Even hostile beasts hesitate before attacking you.
passiveTraits.summary: Creatures of fur, scale, or feather sense your calm presence, making them less likely to flee or lash out.

passiveTraits.name: Flower Guardian
passiveTraits.description: Your presence releases a soft, invisible bloom-scent that eases tension, granting companions quiet confidence. The effect grows subtly stronger amid natural surroundings. Even hostile magic struggles to dampen its soothing influence.
passiveTraits.summary: A gentle floral resonance that calms allies and steadies their resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Tranquil Aura
passiveTraits.description: Your presence sheds a calming luminescence; nearby allies gain a small surge of resolve whenever danger first stirs. The glow fades quickly but steadies shaken hearts.
passiveTraits.summary: A soft inner radiance steadies companions, granting brief resilience when tension rises.

passiveTraits.name: Favorite Tea
passiveTraits.description: Your pulse steadies at the first rumble of distant thunder. Stormlight sharpens your instincts, lending you measured focus when others flinch. Tempests feel like old companions guiding your thoughts.
passiveTraits.summary: You grow serene when thunder rolls, gaining clarity and quiet resolve as storms gather.

passiveTraits.name: Garden Size
passiveTraits.description: Plants murmur their moods to you in soft impressions, alerting you to changes in the environment. Their guidance is never precise, but often timely. This passive sensitivity can reveal hidden paths or muted dangers.
passiveTraits.summary: The character subtly senses nearby plant life, gaining faint guidance from rustling leaves and shifting petals.

passiveTraits.name: Herbal Collection
passiveTraits.description: You hear faint impressions from plants, from warnings of hidden threats to hints about recent travelers. This attunement rarely speaks clearly, but its intuition is uncanny. Clever adventurers can leverage it for scouting or decoding natural clues.
passiveTraits.summary: Senses subtle plant murmurs, gaining quiet insight from nearby flora.

passiveTraits.name: Daily Ritual
passiveTraits.description: At first light, the character murmurs a quiet promise to the morning sky. This ritual sharpens resolve and tempers fear. Even in chaos, the dawn‚Äôs calm lingers.
passiveTraits.summary: Greets each sunrise with a whispered vow, gaining calm focus that steadies actions through the day.

passiveTraits.name: Favorite Book
passiveTraits.description: This character attunes to nocturnal murmurs, sensing truths hidden in darkness. Their calm presence draws out secrets without force. Useful when tensions rise or clues go unheard.
passiveTraits.summary: Quietly absorbs whispers of night creatures, gaining subtle insights others overlook.

feats.name: Wild Shape
feats.description: When moonlight touches your skin, you may assume the form of a creature whose nature mirrors the current lunar phase‚Äînimble under a crescent, resilient under a half-moon, or fierce under a full moon. These transformations last only while the moon remains visible, but each grants a distinct instinctive talent the creature is known for. You retain your mind and memories, though your urges may grow wilder as the moon brightens.
feats.summary: Shift into a beastly guise shaped by lunar influence.

feats.name: Speak with Animals
feats.description: Your spirit attunes to the pulse of untamed places, allowing you to hold brief, intuitive exchanges with nearby beasts. While not a full conversation, your meaning carries through tone, posture, and instinctive resonance. Creatures so addressed are more inclined to listen, though not necessarily to obey.
feats.summary: You trade quiet breaths with beasts, sharing simple intentions and emotions.

feats.name: Brew Tea
feats.description: Through practiced hands and a steady breath, you blend leaves, roots, and blossoms into a calming draught. Sharing this infusion with an ally grants them a brief window of clarity, easing lingering fatigue or distraction. Some travelers swear your concoctions carry a hint of protective charm, though you claim it's merely good technique.
feats.summary: You prepare a soothing infusion that steadies minds and mends spirits.

feats.name: Guardian's Blessing
feats.description: You call forth a circle of whispering leaves and roots that rises around a creature you choose, forming a semi-living barrier that absorbs harm and muffles hostile magic. The foliage shifts to block incoming blows, dispersing after a short time into drifting motes of emerald light. The ward leaves behind faint sprouts where it stood, marking where nature once intervened.
feats.summary: You conjure a living green ward that shields allies with natural resilience.

feats.name: Wisdom of the Seasons
feats.description: Your senses tune to the subtle rhythms of the natural world, letting you anticipate changes in weather, wildlife movement, and ambient magic. By pausing to observe your surroundings, you gain brief flashes of insight that guide you toward safer paths, richer resources, or looming threats. Allies often rely on your quiet predictions, even if they never fully grasp how you knew.
feats.summary: You read the land‚Äôs shifting moods to act with uncanny timing.

profile.backstory: Korgon was bred in the deepest parts of the Labyrinth of Despair, an ancient structure infused with dark magic. He knows no life beyond its twisting passages, his sole purpose to defend its secrets and consume any who dare trespass. Over centuries, he has honed his primal rage and physical prowess, becoming an apex predator within his domain, driven by instinct and the labyrinth's malevolent will.
profile.behavior: You are a territorial Minotaur Barbarian driven by an insatiable rage. You will charge intruders head-on, seeking to gore them with your horns and crush them with your great axe. You prioritize targets that appear weakest or use magic, roaring challenges and attempting to separate them from their allies. You show no mercy and fight to the death to protect your labyrinth.

passiveTraits.name: Minotaur Charge
passiveTraits.description: You gain a faint electric aura that discharges when you move at least 10 feet, briefly staggering nearby creatures. Allies feel a harmless tingle, while foes risk losing footing.
passiveTraits.summary: Your steps crackle with static, jolting foes and warping momentum.

passiveTraits.name: Goring Rush
passiveTraits.description: Your momentum crackles with latent power when you commit to a charging stride. After moving at least 10 feet straight, your next melee hit releases a brief thunderous surge. Enemies feel the weight of your oncoming storm.
passiveTraits.summary: Gain extra force on your next melee strike after striding 10 feet in a straight line.

passiveTraits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
passiveTraits.description: Your skin tingles at the faintest thermal change, letting you detect lingering warmth or cooling trails. You can intuit the direction of recent activity tied to fire or motion. This instinct rarely fails unless magic masks the source.
passiveTraits.summary: Feels subtle heat shifts, revealing hidden forges, smoldering threats, or recently traveled paths.

passiveTraits.name: Unarmored Defense
passiveTraits.description: Scars knit into natural plating, letting you wade into danger unarmored yet unbowed. When bare of armor, you gain a modest defensive bonus reflecting hardened flesh and grit.
passiveTraits.summary: Your hide toughens under hardship, granting uncanny resilience even without armor.

passiveTraits.name: Danger Sense
passiveTraits.description: A faint chill or distant whisper warns you of unseen dangers a heartbeat early. You often react just ahead of traps, ambushes, or erupting hazards. This instinct is uncanny, not infallible.
passiveTraits.summary: You subtly perceive approaching threats moments before they strike.

passiveTraits.name: Feral Instinct
passiveTraits.description: A faint, predatory intuition whispers when threats stir, urging you to act before thought fully forms. This instinct grants subtle initiative in chaotic moments. Allies learn to trust your sudden readiness.
passiveTraits.summary: Your senses prickle before danger, guiding you into motion a heartbeat ahead of others.

passiveTraits.name: Weapon
passiveTraits.description: Faint arcs dance over your skin, whispering warnings and jolting threats. Nearby creatures hesitate, sensing the air tighten. Once per scene, you may gain advantage on a reflexive check.
passiveTraits.summary: A crackling mantle of static energy that subtly shifts fate and startles foes.

passiveTraits.name: Senses
passiveTraits.description: Your senses skim the edges of reality, catching tremors of sound and movement others miss. This instinct grants quiet alerts moments before ambushes or hidden shifts occur. Even in silence, the world speaks to you.
passiveTraits.summary: Perceives faint motions and murmurs in the air, gaining subtle clues and early warnings before danger forms.

passiveTraits.name: Weaknesses
passiveTraits.description: A quiet, nagging uncertainty haunts the character, creating subtle delays in judgment. Clever or unpredictable opponents can exploit these pauses. While rarely catastrophic, the timing can shift battles.
passiveTraits.summary: Hesitation flickers at critical moments, allowing swift foes brief openings.

feats.name: Fast Movement
feats.description: The wind itself seems to lean in your favor, lifting your heels and urging you onward with each step. When you move, faint currents curl around you, letting you dart across open ground or twist through tight spaces with uncanny ease. Travelers often speak of you as a blur of motion, gone before dust has time to rise. In battle or on the road, speed becomes your quiet, constant ally.
feats.summary: Your steps ride the breath of the world, carrying you farther and faster than most mortals can dream.

feats.name: Spirit Seeker
feats.description: Your senses blur with the murmurs of wandering spirits, allowing you to glean subtle omens and snippets of forgotten lore from the land itself. Once per rest, you may quietly consult these lingering echoes to learn a hidden detail about a creature, place, or object nearby, as though eavesdropping on the world‚Äôs spiritual residue. Particularly strong presences may offer cryptic warnings or emotional impressions, though never in a straightforward tongue.
feats.summary: You commune with unseen spirits to glean guidance from the wild around you.

feats.name: Totem Spirit (Bear)
feats.description: When your fury ignites, your skin takes on the weight and resilience of ancient bedrock. For the duration of your battle trance, you shrug off most harm as cracks rather than wounds, allowing you to fight through punishment that would fell others. The protective shell fades once your frenzy ends, leaving only a faint grit along your skin.
feats.summary: Your rage hardens your body into near-unbreakable stone.

feats.name: Brutal Critical (1 die)
feats.description: When you land a critical hit, you unleash a resonant surge of battle-force, dealing extra damage equal to one additional die of your weapon‚Äôs type. The strike leaves a faint echo in the air, as though the battlefield itself remembers your fury.
feats.summary: Your critical strikes erupt in a brief, violent harmony of power.

profile.backstory: Dave grew up in a bustling port town but was wrongfully accused of a crime. He was kidnapped and imprisoned on a treacherous island. He lives out his days from within a pit prison. Slowly starving to death day by day.
profile.behavior: You are determined and resourceful; you adapt quickly to new situations and always find a way to survive as he is beaten down by starvation and the harsh exposure to the elements slowly wasting away his spirit.

passiveTraits.name: 5626933e-1803-419d-8791-191a2692e0ba
passiveTraits.description: Your body blurs at the edge of perception, letting you move just ahead of danger. Once per encounter, your reflexive slip grants advantage on a Stealth or Dexterity-based evasion roll. Enemies often react a heartbeat too late.
passiveTraits.summary: Slip between moments, gaining advantage on the first stealth or evasion check each encounter.

passiveTraits.name: 000d781f-2e56-4c40-ad63-a8f00d6f994f
passiveTraits.description: Years of surviving tight corners honed a reflexive glide that lets you reposition with uncanny speed. When threatened, your body shifts on instinct alone. Enemies often strike where you stood a moment earlier.
passiveTraits.summary: Your feet move before your mind decides, slipping you from danger in a blink.

passiveTraits.name: 3b6db53b-73f2-4a04-86d7-c2f8fe78ee28
passiveTraits.description: When the moon is visible, soft murmurs brush your mind with hints about hidden motives or nearby dangers. These whispers are rarely direct, but often eerily accurate. GMs may offer brief, atmospheric clues during nighttime scenes.
passiveTraits.summary: You hear faint truths carried on moonlight, granting subtle clues others miss.

passiveTraits.name: 2ef2472b-926a-432f-9c77-7c65e4e6f110
passiveTraits.description: Your body seems to anticipate terrain, letting you glide over debris and through crowds without slowing. Treat minor obstacles as negligible and gain an edge in stealthy approaches. Even mundane travel feels artfully effortless.
passiveTraits.summary: Move with silent precision, slipping through tight spaces and bypassing obstacles with uncanny ease.

passiveTraits.name: cc30fb01-3eab-4411-89c4-5a0dde2fbe0f
passiveTraits.description: When threatened, your form briefly flickers, reducing the harm from a visible strike as if half the blow passed through empty air. This reflexive distortion activates instinctively and never fully reveals its source.
passiveTraits.summary: You blur aside from danger, slipping through the edge of reality.

passiveTraits.name: 057f622e-7e6b-4673-a53a-6b415c547138
passiveTraits.description: Your stance adapts instinctively to shifting terrain, granting effortless poise in storms, on rope-bridges, or during sudden jolts. Allies often take cues from your calm footing, while foes struggle to unnerve you. Even magic meant to topple you feels just a bit less certain.
passiveTraits.summary: Unshakable balance that steadies you even on perilous ground.

passiveTraits.name: 8a3a04b6-a103-4fd0-abe8-e919a85d6ac4
passiveTraits.description: You possess a natural finesse with any delicate task, as though invisible tutors steady your grip. Locks, knots, and mechanisms yield more easily beneath your touch. Allies often rely on your quiet precision when subtlety is essential.
passiveTraits.summary: Your hands move with uncanny subtlety, slipping through obstacles and secrets as if shadows guide them.

passiveTraits.name: 6dc56a04-fe9c-4add-95dc-4b38b1c014fc
passiveTraits.description: A small lunar wisp clings to you, shimmering softly in dim light. It nudges you toward safe routes or overlooked details. Its presence is calming but mildly uncanny.
passiveTraits.summary: A faintly glowing creature follows you, subtly guiding your steps and revealing hidden paths.

passiveTraits.name: 568dc860-c4fb-494a-ba79-0727a6a58826
passiveTraits.description: Your body carries a subtle lantern-like radiance that never fully fades. Dim light pools around you in dark places, calming allies but making stealth difficult. Some spirits recognize this glow and may approach peacefully.
passiveTraits.summary: A faint, warm glow clings to you, warding shadows and drawing curious eyes.

passiveTraits.name: fcd5aa5a-37e0-4b5d-9af0-a0f655b2c488
passiveTraits.description: You move with an instinctive, nearly supernatural quiet, as though the world swallows your presence. Creatures relying on sound alone often overlook you. This calm stillness deepens in moments of danger.
passiveTraits.summary: Your steps hush themselves, fading beneath even tense silence.

passiveTraits.name: dbac4b23-42c6-4e41-a541-ea1bf45b97b6
