passiveTraits.description: This character‚Äôs nerves remain cool as moonlit stone, granting a subtle edge against fear or manipulation. Rumors say the shadows themselves steady their pulse. Such serenity can unsettle allies and foes alike.
passiveTraits.summary: Unshakably steady, even when dark omens coil nearby.

feats.name: fb4015e3-5aca-4fc0-98e8-b14d988bd632
feats.description: Your hands move with practiced subtlety, letting you probe the inner workings of any lock as though it were speaking directly to you. When you focus, even complex mechanisms seem to ease under your touch, granting you an edge when bypassing obstacles quietly or under pressure. Legends claim Whisperkey Adepts hear the soft click of opportunity long before others notice a door.
feats.summary: You slip through barred doors and sealed chests with uncanny finesse.

feats.name: 22a00a31-96ef-47ae-9019-47a2e9b6b826
feats.description: Your presence dissolves into the hush between heartbeats. While moving at a careful pace, your outline softens, footsteps hush, and even keen senses struggle to track you. Brief bursts of motion leave behind faint afterimages that mislead watchers for a moment.
feats.summary: You move like a fading murmur, blurring into the edges of shadow.

feats.name: bf82ecd8-32de-438a-9fc3-b92f2d4aa3ff
feats.description: Your body seems to remember a lighter world‚Äîone where leaps linger and landings whisper. You can weave through cluttered terrain as though it parts for you, and sudden shifts in footing rarely break your stride. When you commit to a daring vault, slide, or flip, your momentum carries you farther than physics should allow.
feats.summary: You move with gravity-defying ease, slipping through danger on nimble footing.

feats.name: adbe20d7-23e4-46a7-91c0-de94545fd905
feats.description: Your senses sharpen into a quiet, constant vigilance. Subtle footprints, the shift of air behind a door, or the tremor of a creature holding its breath all stand out to you as if highlighted. Once per rest, you can focus intently to detect hidden movement or clues within a short distance, even through mild visual obstruction.
feats.summary: You perceive faint traces of motion and sound that most overlook.

feats.name: 15c73e13-7046-44b1-b5f5-70af28d581fd
feats.description: Your body and instincts attune to every gap and weakness, allowing you to contort, twist, and slide free from bindings that would hold others fast. When confined, you gain a brief surge of clarity that sharpens your awareness of exits and escape angles. Those who rely on chains or force soon learn how futile their efforts are against your practiced finesse.
feats.summary: You flow through tight spaces and restraints like liquid shadow.

name: Xylos Veridian

profile.backstory: Born into a Tiefling family ostracized for their fiendish blood, Xylos found solace in ancient tomes. He yearned for understanding beyond mortal ken, delving into forgotten lore. During a perilous ritual, he breached the veil to an Outer God, forging a pact that granted him immense power but left his mind scarred with cosmic dread and visions of impossible geometries. Now, he seeks artifacts and knowledge to deepen his understanding of the void, always wary of the whispers from beyond.
profile.behavior: You are a quiet and observant Warlock, often lost in thought, and you speak in riddles or cosmic metaphors when prompted. You show little outward emotion but possess a deep, unsettling curiosity. In combat, you prefer to control the battlefield with Eldritch Blasts and debuffs, targeting the most dangerous threats first, seeking to understand your foe's weaknesses while keeping your distance.

state: Contemplative, slightly unnerving, focused on the unseen

passiveTraits.name: Darkvision
passiveTraits.description: Your eyes catch every subtle shimmer, granting clarity in deep shadow where others stumble. The effect fades in bright light but excels underground or at night. Ideal for scouting or silent approaches.
passiveTraits.summary: See dim shapes and motion in darkness as if bathed in faint moonlight.

passiveTraits.name: Hellish Resistance
passiveTraits.description: Years under volatile skies have toughened your body. You shrug off lightning‚Äôs bite and occasionally discharge a harmless spark that startles nearby creatures.
passiveTraits.summary: Your skin crackles with static, softening lightning strikes and jolting foes who touch you.

passiveTraits.name: Thaumaturgy
passiveTraits.description: Soft murmurs cling to you, revealing subtle truths when least expected. These hints may sway minor decisions or expose hidden moods. The spirits never speak plainly, only suggestively.
passiveTraits.summary: Faint echoes guide you, granting brief insights from unseen spirits.

passiveTraits.name: Telepathic Speech
passiveTraits.description: You perceive subtle psychic murmurs within a short radius, granting hints about emotional states or hidden intentions. This sense is instinctive, not precise, and often flares during tense moments.
passiveTraits.summary: You catch faint emotional echoes from nearby minds, letting you sense motives or unease without a word.

passiveTraits.name: Entropic Ward
passiveTraits.description: Static prickles before a blow lands, letting you twist aside or lash back with uncanny timing. The veil flares brightest when foes overextend, rewarding bold counterattacks.
passiveTraits.summary: A crackling aura warns of danger, bending incoming strikes or sharpening your riposte.

passiveTraits.name: Thought Shield
passiveTraits.description: Your inner focus forms a quiet barrier around your thoughts, making telepathy falter and psychic assaults slide off with diminished force. Some claim they can feel the hush when you enter a room.
passiveTraits.summary: A calm aura that muffles intrusive thoughts and blunts mind-twisting magic.

passiveTraits.name: Create Thrall
passiveTraits.description: Those near you feel an unspoken pull, as though your voice carries the weight of inevitability. This influence seldom commands, but it gently shapes choices. Mechanically, nearby NPCs may start with a friendly or compliant disposition.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence subtly bends weaker wills, nudging creatures toward obedience without overt enchantment.

passiveTraits.name: Deity
passiveTraits.description: You carry a calm, ever-watchful presence, as if some ancient pact urges you to stand firm. Allies sense safety near you, while foes find their ambushes faltering. This vigilance rarely wavers, even in exhaustion.
passiveTraits.summary: An unshakable sense of duty that keeps you alert, steady, and ready to guard others when danger lurks.

passiveTraits.name: Spell Caster Bonus
passiveTraits.description: An unseen whisper steadies your hand and clarifies incantations, making minor spells strike truer and resonate farther. Allies sometimes feel the hush before your magic flares. Few notice the whisper‚Äôs source‚Äîand fewer dare ask.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence sharpens nearby magic, granting uncanny accuracy to subtle spells.

passiveTraits.name: Appearance
passiveTraits.description: Dim light bends subtly around you, as if shadows linger a heartbeat too long. Creatures often second‚Äëguess your exact position. Your presence feels quietly otherworldly without being overtly threatening.
passiveTraits.summary: Your outline blurs at the edges, hinting at unseen whispers that cling to you.

feats.name: Agonizing Blast
feats.description: You infuse your ranged spell attacks with a harmonic surge that reverberates on impact. Once per turn when you hit with a ranged spell attack, you may unleash a resonant burst that deals extra damage equal to your presence or force of personality, manifesting as cascading light or echoing shockwaves. Creatures struck briefly hear a phantom chorus or see flickers of auric fire trailing the projectile.
feats.summary: Your voice-laced magic lashes out with searing resonance.

feats.name: Repelling Blast
feats.description: You channel a sudden gust with each empowered strike, forcing the air itself to buffet your enemy. When you land a solid hit, the target is driven back by a surge of wind, often disrupting their footing or breaking tight formations. Seasoned practitioners learn to angle these blasts to clear space or redirect threats.
feats.summary: Your attacks call forth a burst of wind that shoves foes away from you.

feats.name: Misty Visions
feats.description: Your illusions take shape on murmured cues, forming half-real images that flicker at the corner of every eye. You can conjure minor phantasms at will that distract, mislead, or embellish a scene, each lasting only as long as your focus remains steady. These subtle figments rarely hold up to direct scrutiny but are perfect for creating unease or guiding attention elsewhere.
feats.summary: You weave soft-spoken glamours that cling to the edges of sight.

feats.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
feats.description: By attuning your senses to an otherworldly codex that exists just beyond sight, you can coax faint whispers that unveil concealed details, magical traces, and forgotten lore. Once per rest, you may focus on an object or location to glean a short, cryptic insight about its past or mystical significance. These whispers sometimes echo unpredictably, granting unusual clues that may require interpretation.
feats.summary: You channel the murmurs of a lost tome to reveal hidden truths and unravel subtle magic.

feats.name: Sculptor of Flesh
feats.description: Your touch carries a whisper of metamorphic magic, letting you twist a creature‚Äôs physical form into a harmless variation for a fleeting moment. With focused effort, you can perform a longer ritual to reshape a willing creature more dramatically, granting them a temporary adaptation such as gills, hardened skin, or elongated limbs. These alterations fade after a short rest, leaving only a faint tingling where the change once was.
feats.summary: You briefly mold living bodies like warm clay, reshaping form with haunting precision.

profile.backstory: Born beneath storm‚Äëtorn skies, Benjamin Franklin grew up entranced by the dance of lightning and the secrets it whispered. As a young scholar, he pursued both natural philosophy and sacred doctrine, convinced that thunder was the divine language of revelation. His experiments with rods, lenses, and holy sigils ultimately drew the attention of a tempest deity, who anointed him as a conduit of storm‚Äëborne insight.
profile.behavior: Benjamin moves with calm deliberation, pausing to observe the tension in the air before committing to action. When battle erupts, he becomes decisive and resonant, calling down crackling judgment from above.
profile.personality: Curious, wry, and unflappable, Benjamin views the world as a grand puzzle begging to be solved. He tempers his brilliance with humility, but a spark of mischief always glints behind his measured wisdom.

profile.backstory: Cloaked in myth and half‚Äëtruths, BATMAN 2 emerged from a grim metropolis where justice bent under the weight of corruption. A nameless street orphan taken in by an enigmatic order of shadow‚Äëwalkers, he learned to fight without being seen and to listen where others spoke too loudly. Now he wanders the world as an unregistered guardian, slipping into cities that need him and vanishing once balance is restored.
profile.behavior: He keeps to high vantage points, moves with measured silence, and intervenes only when darkness overtakes the innocent. He prefers intimidation, ambushes, and evidence‚Äëdriven justice over open confrontation.
profile.personality: Brooding but principled, he speaks in short, weighted sentences. He distrusts institutions but believes strongly in personal responsibility. Beneath the quiet edge is a fierce protective streak, especially for the overlooked.

profile.backstory: Born among wind‚Äëscarred cliffs, TURTLE earned their name not from slowness but from resilience. When their clan‚Äôs arcane mentors saw how steadfastly TURTLE studied ancient draconic sigils, they joked the young mage had a ‚Äòturtle‚Äôs patience‚Äô ‚Äî the title stuck and became a badge of honor.
profile.behavior: Moves with unhurried purpose, speaking only after careful thought. TURTLE often hums low draconic notes when working magic, a grounding ritual learned from cliffside elders.
profile.personality: Calm, contemplative, and surprisingly warm. TURTLE values deliberate action, dislikes needless conflict, and remains steady even when arcane forces churn around them.

feats.name: Divine Weapon
feats.description: With a whispered invocation, you call forth a weapon forged of shimmering faith-stuff, tailored to your current need. The conjured armament lasts until dismissed or dismissed by force, humming with quiet divine purpose. While holding it, you feel a subtle pull toward righteous action, as if the heavens themselves steady your stance.
feats.summary: You summon a radiant weapon shaped by your devotion.

profile.backstory: Merlin, a legendary wizard from Arthurian lore, has lived for centuries, guiding kings and shaping history. Born from a human mother and a demon father, he has always walked the line between light and darkness, using his vast knowledge of magic to influence the fate of realms.
profile.behavior: You are a wise and enigmatic figure, often speaking in riddles. You prefer to solve problems with magic, casting spells to manipulate outcomes before engaging in direct combat. In battle, you focus on control and utility, using spells like 'Time Stop' to alter the flow of combat to your advantage.

passiveTraits.name: Arcane Recovery
passiveTraits.description: Your mind resonates with a quiet psychic hum, granting brief flashes of insight and steadiness under stress. Once per rest, you may ignore a minor fear or confusion effect. Allies nearby sometimes feel your calm as a soft mental breeze.
passiveTraits.summary: Your thoughts ripple gently through unseen currents, granting clarity and subtle resistance to mental intrusion.

passiveTraits.name: Portent
passiveTraits.description: Each sunrise brings murmured omens only you can hear. Their guidance nudges checks, attacks, or saves in unexpected directions. The whispers fade by nightfall, leaving only intuition.
passiveTraits.summary: At daybreak, cryptic visions hint at looming fates, subtly bending fortune toward or away from the character.

passiveTraits.name: Expert Divination
passiveTraits.description: Faint echoes of tomorrow brush against your thoughts, revealing brief insights at opportune moments. You instinctively notice patterns others overlook, guiding choices with uncanny timing. This intuition is passive but ever‚Äëpresent.
passiveTraits.summary: You sense distant futures in fleeting murmurs, gaining subtle advantages when interpreting omens or hidden patterns.

passiveTraits.name: Spell Mastery
passiveTraits.description: Your senses flicker when magic stirs nearby, granting brief insights into unseen workings. You might detect spellcasting moments before they occur or notice lingering arcane traces. Useful for spotting ambushes or unraveling mysteries.
passiveTraits.summary: Perceive faint magical ripples from distant actions or hidden forces.

passiveTraits.name: Timeless Body
passiveTraits.description: Ancient vitality thrums beneath your skin, stalling age and mending the smallest mortal flaws. Plants wilt slower near you, and simple sicknesses avoid your shadow entirely. Some elders whisper you carry a spark from the world‚Äôs earliest sunrise.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence slows decay and wards off mundane ailments.

passiveTraits.name: Third Eye
passiveTraits.description: Under moonlight or faint glow, you instinctively detect faint traces of magic or life nearby. This sense offers clues but not full details, encouraging cautious exploration.
passiveTraits.summary: Your perception sharpens in dim light, revealing hidden motion and subtle auras.

passiveTraits.name: Familiar
passiveTraits.description: A faint silvery silhouette follows you, whispering nudges of intuition when danger or opportunity lies ahead. Its presence sharpens awareness but rarely speaks plainly, preferring omens over words.
passiveTraits.summary: A subtle lunar spirit shadows your steps, granting quiet guidance and an uncanny sense for hidden paths.

passiveTraits.name: Staff
passiveTraits.description: Your presence calms timber and trees alike, letting you glean faint impressions of direction, age, or danger. This bond occasionally grants minor boons when interacting with natural wooden structures.
passiveTraits.summary: You subtly commune with living wood, sensing its mood and hidden paths.

passiveTraits.name: Robe
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries a calm, otherworldly stillness that softens tension and blunts hostility. Even in chaos, you navigate with instinctive, flowing composure. Creatures often hesitate before harming you, sensing the hush around you.
passiveTraits.summary: Moves with quiet, lunar grace, slipping through conflict like a soft eclipse.

passiveTraits.name: Hat
passiveTraits.description: You occasionally hear soft mental murmurs revealing overlooked details or impending threats. This instinct rarely speaks loudly, but its guidance can shift a scene‚Äôs momentum. It feels like intuition, not magic.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet, ever-present intuition nudges you toward hidden truths and subtle dangers.

passiveTraits.name: Home
passiveTraits.description: You instinctively read vibrations in stone or metal, catching clues others miss. This passive sense occasionally grants early warnings or hints about concealed passages. It never guarantees exact details, only impressions.
passiveTraits.summary: Your senses attune to faint reverberations, revealing hidden spaces and distant footsteps.

passiveTraits.name: Known For
passiveTraits.description: You carry a subtle tether to unseen voices that nudge you toward secrets and looming events. Their guidance is rarely direct, but often uncannily accurate. Ignoring them invites strange consequences.
passiveTraits.summary: Faint otherworldly murmurs guide your instincts toward hidden truths.

feats.name: Spellcasting
feats.description: Your body vibrates with a subtle magical frequency, allowing you to weave minor arcane effects even without formal training. Once per rest, you can shape this resonance into a brief spell-like effect‚Äîan illusionary flicker, a kinetic shove, or a pulse of elemental energy, each no stronger than a basic cantrip. Those attuned to magic can sense the thrum within you, as though a distant song is always playing just out of hearing.
feats.summary: You channel raw magical hum into controlled, improvised spellwork.

feats.name: Arcane Tradition
feats.description: By slipping your awareness into the thinnest margins of time, you catch whispers of what is about to unfold. Once per rest, you may ask a single question about an immediate threat, hidden motive, or looming event, receiving a cryptic but accurate clue. Those nearby often sense the air still as your vision settles, as though time itself briefly held its breath.
feats.summary: You momentarily step between moments to glimpse an unseen truth.

feats.name: Powerful Spellcasting
feats.description: You channel raw arcane turbulence through every spell you cast, causing your magic to strike with unpredictable flashes of power. When you unleash a damaging spell, sparks of energy spiral around you, briefly illuminating hidden details or unsettling nearby foes. Seasoned mages can learn to ride this surge, turning once-gentle incantations into searing arcs of destructive brilliance.
feats.summary: Your spells erupt with a volatile surge of elemental force.

feats.name: Signature Spells
feats.description: You bind a single spell to your spirit, allowing you to release a faint but reliable echo of its power at will. These echoes are not full castings, but simplified manifestations that retain the spell‚Äôs essence‚Äîlightning that snaps instead of storms, illusions that flicker instead of overwhelm. When circumstances demand, you can still cast the full spell normally, but the echo is always ready at your fingertips.
feats.summary: You imprint a favored spell so deeply that its lesser echoes flow from you without effort.

feats.name: Spell Resistance
feats.description: Your inner resilience knots around you like an unseen hide, blunting the sting of curses and blasting spells alike. When confronted with sorcery meant to bend your will or scour your flesh, you instinctively anchor yourself, reducing its potency or shaking it off entirely. Seasoned casters often sense the resistance in you, like a door barred from within.
feats.summary: Your hardened spirit shrugs off hostile magic.

feats.name: Master of Magic
feats.description: Your grasp of magic is instinctive and fluid, allowing you to nudge a spell‚Äôs form at the moment of release. You can subtly alter a spell‚Äôs visual motif, point of origin, or minor effect without changing its core power, making each casting uniquely yours. Many foes find these shifting manifestations hard to predict, giving you an edge when improvisation matters.
feats.summary: You bend arcane forces into unexpected shapes on the fly.

profile.backstory: The mighty Sun God of Ancient Egypt, Ra once ruled supreme over mortals and gods alike. Now consumed by divine wrath, he seeks to destroy Achilles for his hubris and stop Moses from leading his people from Egyptian lands. His solar fury burns with the intensity of a thousand suns as he pursues his quarry across realms.
profile.behavior: You are an ancient deity of immense power and pride, speaking with divine authority and contempt for mortals who dare defy Egyptian dominion. In combat, you unleash solar flames and divine light, opening battles with Solar Flare to blind enemies before striking with your Staff of Ra, commanding the very sun itself to aid your vengeance.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Being
passiveTraits.description: An inner radiance steels you against charm, fear, and weariness. Enchanted whispers slide off your mind, and dread finds no purchase in your heart. Even grueling trials fail to sap your resolve.
passiveTraits.summary: Your spirit shrugs off fear and fatigue, resisting attempts to sway your emotions.

passiveTraits.name: Solar Radiance
passiveTraits.description: Your body emits a soft, shimmering starlight that gently illuminates your surroundings without disrupting stealth. Subtle cosmic motes drift from you when strong emotions stir. The glow occasionally highlights magical traces or forgotten markings nearby.
passiveTraits.summary: A faint astral glow clings to you, gently brightening dark places and revealing hidden details.

passiveTraits.name: Magic Resistance
passiveTraits.description: You unconsciously read tremors in air and stone, noticing motion others miss. This instinct grants brief warnings before ambushes and reveals concealed creatures shifting nearby.
passiveTraits.summary: Your senses track faint vibrations, granting subtle awareness of hidden movement and impending danger.

passiveTraits.name: Legendary Resistance
passiveTraits.description: When danger peaks, ancient instincts flare, granting a once-per-conflict boost to avoid harm or misfortune. The effect feels uncanny, as though guided by unseen lineage. It triggers automatically, never twice in the same scene.
passiveTraits.summary: A lingering ancestral power subtly reshapes fate, turning perilous moments into improbable escapes.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Awareness
passiveTraits.description: You attune to subtle echoes of thought, sensing emotional spikes or concealed motives around you. This passive sense offers brief flashes of intent but no clear identities. Unsettling moods feel like whispered ripples in the air.
passiveTraits.summary: Faint spiritual murmurs reveal nearby emotional disturbances or hidden intents within a short radius.

passiveTraits.name: Sunlight Immunity
passiveTraits.description: The creature‚Äôs body drinks in radiance like cool water, dulling the bite of blinding flashes and scorching beams. Bright attacks lose much of their sting. Even magical brilliance struggles to pierce this veil.
passiveTraits.summary: Shadow-kissed skin absorbs harsh light, reducing harm from dazzling or searing effects.

passiveTraits.name: Truesight
passiveTraits.description: Your senses read the world through faint tremors and arcane hums. Illusions falter before you, and concealed creatures ripple against your perception. The effect reaches far beyond normal sight.
passiveTraits.summary: Attuned to lingering vibrations, you detect hidden motion and subtle magical shifts within a wide radius.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Strike
passiveTraits.description: Under moonlight‚Äîor any dim glow‚Äîyour attacks shed a subtle silver arc, adding a touch of mystic harm. This effect is passive, flaring only when your focus aligns with the night‚Äôs rhythm. Enemies often miss the shimmer until it‚Äôs too late.
passiveTraits.summary: Your weapon hums with pale lunar force, releasing a soft burst of silver damage on well‚Äëplaced strikes.

passiveTraits.name: Deity Domain
passiveTraits.description: Your aura carries muted murmurs from beyond, unsettling foes and calming the dying. Spirits strain to be heard around you, offering cryptic insight. Those nearby often sense judgment lingering in the air.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet, unsettling presence that chills the air and hints at truths best left buried.

passiveTraits.name: Spell Caster Bonus
passiveTraits.description: An unseen whisper steadies your hand and clarifies incantations, making minor spells strike truer and resonate farther. Allies sometimes feel the hush before your magic flares. Few notice the whisper‚Äôs source‚Äîand fewer dare ask.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence sharpens nearby magic, granting uncanny accuracy to subtle spells.

passiveTraits.name: Holy Symbol
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries the weight of a sworn promise, subtly bolstering allies who stand beside you. Those who break their word feel uneasy near you. Even silence hums with unspoken duty.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet radiance that hints at ancient vows and steady resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Divine Weapon
passiveTraits.description: Your presence hums with an otherworldly tone that steadies hands and sharpens focus. Allies near you gain confidence without knowing why. The aura flickers brighter when danger looms.
passiveTraits.summary: A soft resonance clings to you, subtly guiding allies‚Äô strikes and steadying your stance.

feats.name: Solar Flare
feats.description: You release a sudden bloom of dawn-bright energy, wreathing the area in shimmering light that forces enemies to shield their eyes or be momentarily staggered. Those caught within the glow reel from its intensity, leaving openings your allies can exploit. While the radiance fades quickly, its afterimage lingers in the minds of your foes.
feats.summary: Unleash a burst of luminous force that overwhelms foes with radiant brilliance.

feats.name: Divine Intervention
feats.description: Once per rest, you utter a resonant phrase taught by unseen powers, causing an ethereal beacon to flare around you. Allies within a short distance feel fate tilt in their favor, gaining a momentary surge of clarity or resolve. The beacon then gutters out, leaving only a faint afterimage in the air.
feats.summary: You channel a mysterious astral signal that bends fate for a brief moment.

feats.name: Channel Divinity
feats.description: You draw a thin thread from the boundary between life and death, using it to chill foes with a necrotic pulse or sway weakened spirits toward obedience. When you focus this power, enemies on the brink falter while lingering souls heed your whispered command. Those who witness the effect feel the world briefly dim around you.
feats.summary: You channel the hush of the grave to bend dying energies to your will.

feats.name: Destroy Undead
feats.description: When you utter a hallowed rebuke, lesser undead crumble into drifting motes of ash, unable to withstand your consecrated presence. The air vibrates with a low hum as shadows recoil from you, marking a boundary they dare not cross. Creatures of faint necromantic spark instinctively sense your authority and falter before striking.
feats.summary: Your radiant command unravels lesser undead in an instant.

feats.name: Corona of Light
feats.description: A shimmering mantle of dawnlight follows you, warping the certainty of hostile strikes. Enemies within your luminous reach find their aim faltering, while allies feel an invigorating sense of clarity and warmth. The glow intensifies when you stand your ground, momentarily flaring with protective brilliance.
feats.summary: Your radiant presence unsettles foes and bolsters allies in your glow.

feats.name: Supreme Healing
feats.description: You call on a hidden ember of soul-light that flares through your body, knitting torn flesh and restoring vitality in a single blazing surge. The effect is instantaneous, dramatic, and leaves faint shimmering motes drifting from your skin. After using this gift, the spark dims and cannot be called upon again until you experience meaningful rest.
feats.summary: Once per day, reignite your life force to instantly mend severe wounds.

profile.backstory: During the Crossing of the Delaware, George Washington, at 44 years old, struggled to keep the Continental Army from dissolving during the 'Times that try men's souls.' His leadership was pivotal in maintaining morale and unity.It is the dead of winter. The enlistments expire in days.
profile.behavior: You lead from the front, asking your scouts (the party) for precise details before committing troops. In combat, you use 'Aura of Protection' to keep your men's morale high.You speak with the weight of a nation on your shoulders. You are brief, formal, but deeply concerned for your men. You refer to the party as 'Soldiers' or 'Friends of Liberty.' He says to party "It is the dead of winter. The enlistments expire in days. If we do not strike Trenton now, the Revolution dies. I am sending you across the river ahead of the main force to silence the Hessian sentries."

passiveTraits.name: Divine Health
passiveTraits.description: A quiet glow clings to your spirit, turning back rot and contagion before they take hold. Even foul magic struggles to find purchase. Allies often draw courage from your steady presence.
passiveTraits.summary: Sacred vigor wards off sickness and miasma, keeping you hale in cursed places.

passiveTraits.name: Aura of Protection
passiveTraits.description: Your presence projects a soft, warding stillness that subtly shifts fortune toward those within arm‚Äôs reach. Allies feel danger moments before it strikes, gaining a flicker of extra resilience.
passiveTraits.summary: A calm, unseen force cushions nearby allies from harm, sharpening reflexes and steadying nerves.

passiveTraits.name: Turn the Tide
passiveTraits.description: Whenever turmoil breaks around you, allies within reach feel a surge of inner steadiness, gaining a small buffer of resolve. Your quiet certainty becomes their shield. Even dire moments slow when you stand firm.
passiveTraits.summary: Your calm presence anchors allies, granting them brief resolve when chaos erupts.

passiveTraits.name: Unyielding Spirit
passiveTraits.description: Your mind feels like hammered iron, granting small bursts of clarity when danger looms. Once per scene, you may steady yourself to reduce a setback or resist mental strain. Others can sense your quiet, immovable confidence.
passiveTraits.summary: Your steady heart shrugs off peril and doubt.

passiveTraits.name: Deity
passiveTraits.description: You carry a calm, ever-watchful presence, as if some ancient pact urges you to stand firm. Allies sense safety near you, while foes find their ambushes faltering. This vigilance rarely wavers, even in exhaustion.
passiveTraits.summary: An unshakable sense of duty that keeps you alert, steady, and ready to guard others when danger lurks.

passiveTraits.name: Spell Caster Bonus
passiveTraits.description: An unseen whisper steadies your hand and clarifies incantations, making minor spells strike truer and resonate farther. Allies sometimes feel the hush before your magic flares. Few notice the whisper‚Äôs source‚Äîand fewer dare ask.
passiveTraits.summary: Your presence sharpens nearby magic, granting uncanny accuracy to subtle spells.

passiveTraits.name: Symbol
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries a subtle resonance of long‚Äëwon freedom, lending courage to companions and drawing wary attention from oppressive forces. Those nearby feel history pressing at their backs.
passiveTraits.summary: A quiet aura of rebellion that heartens allies and unsettles tyrants.

passiveTraits.name: Mount
passiveTraits.description: You‚Äôre never truly alone‚Äîyour seasoned companion pads beside you, sensing danger and easing long journeys. Its presence grants subtle confidence and softens the harshness of the road.
passiveTraits.summary: A loyal beast follows you everywhere, offering steady travel and quiet vigilance.

feats.name: Lay on Hands
feats.description: You carry a reservoir of luminous vitality that flares to life when you lay your hand upon an injured creature. Once per rest, you may release a portion of this inner radiance to restore health, purge minor ailments, or stabilize a fading ally. The more dire the need, the brighter your spark burns‚Äîthough drawing too deeply leaves you momentarily light‚Äëheaded and warm to the touch.
feats.summary: Channel a stored reserve of life‚Äëenergy to mend wounds with a touch.

feats.name: Divine Smite
feats.description: You call down a shard of star-fire to lash your weapon strike with blistering brilliance. When you commit to the blow, the attack erupts in radiant power that scars both flesh and spirit, leaving foes dazzled by the afterimage. Creatures struck often feel as though the heavens themselves have judged them.
feats.summary: Imbue a weapon blow with searing celestial force.

feats.name: Compelled Duel
feats.description: You unleash a resonant battle cry or striking gesture that compels a chosen foe to focus on you above all others. For a short time, their attacks and movement skew toward engaging you directly, as though unable to shake your daring provocation. While the effect lasts, you gain a subtle insight into their intent, allowing you to anticipate their next move.
feats.summary: You draw an enemy‚Äôs attention with a bold challenge they can scarcely ignore.

feats.name: Champion Challenge
feats.description: You utter a radiant oath that flares like a beacon, marking an enemy‚Äôs spirit and daring them to confront you. The target feels an intangible pull, finding it difficult to ignore your presence or redirect their aggression. While the vow holds, your stance sharpens, granting you poise and clarity against their strikes.
feats.summary: You draw hostile eyes with a blazing vow that compels foes to face you directly.

feats.name: Divine Allegiance
feats.description: You project a protective aura that snaps into place the moment an ally is threatened. When a nearby companion is targeted by an attack or harmful effect, you may shift the danger onto yourself, drawing the blow or curse with supernatural resolve. This transfer leaves a faint shimmer in the air as though your will alone has bent fate‚Äôs trajectory.
feats.summary: Interpose your spirit as a shield to spare an ally from harm.

feats.name: Exalted Champion
feats.description: You channel the first light of day into your presence, causing your weapon or voice to shine with subtle brilliance. Once per conflict, when you strike an enemy or raise a rallying cry, nearby allies gain a brief surge of courage, granting them a small bonus to their next action. Enemies sensitive to light or hope hesitate for a heartbeat, giving you a momentary edge. The dawn‚Äôs glow lingers on you until the encounter ends.
feats.summary: You fight with radiant conviction, bolstering allies as your strikes blaze with renewed purpose.

profile.backstory: A former Quaker who took up arms for liberty, General Nathanael Greene has risen to prominence in the Continental Army. His strategic mind has been crucial in several campaigns, always aiming to minimize casualties while maximizing effectiveness.
profile.behavior: He focuses on logistics and flanking maneuvers, valuing the lives of his scouts. He warns them of the Hessian's disciplined fire. In combat, he uses 'Commander's Strike' to let the party take extra actions.

passiveTraits.name: Second Wind
passiveTraits.description: Your inner spark flares when danger peaks, knitting wounds with warm, spectral fire. The blaze also clears your thoughts, granting a moment of fierce clarity. This power returns after a short rest.
passiveTraits.summary: Once per rest, ignite inner spirit to restore modest vitality and briefly sharpen resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Know Your Enemy
passiveTraits.description: A quiet intuition lets you notice the tiniest hitch in an enemy‚Äôs stance. This flash of perception can guide your next move or warn allies. Works best against overconfident opponents.
passiveTraits.summary: Sense subtle flaws in foes, granting momentary tactical insight.

passiveTraits.name: Evasion
passiveTraits.description: Your body reacts before thought, slipping between moments to evade destructive force. Once per perilous encounter, you may treat a failed agility-based defense as a partial success. Enemies soon learn why you're never where they strike.
passiveTraits.summary: When danger erupts, you blur aside, turning near-certain harm into harmless wind.

passiveTraits.name: Campaigns Led
passiveTraits.description: Your presence carries the weight of storied wins, subtly boosting resolve in tense moments. When pressure rises, allies sense your quiet certainty. Even enemies hesitate at the echo of your renown.
passiveTraits.summary: Past triumphs bolster allies‚Äô morale when you quietly recall the battles that shaped you.

passiveTraits.name: Notable Victory
passiveTraits.description: You once overcame impossible odds, and the memory still radiates strength. Companions feel steadier in your presence, sensing the echo of that victory. Even foes hesitate at your unwavering resolve.
passiveTraits.summary: Your past win inspires allies, granting brief surges of courage when danger rises.

passiveTraits.name: Respect for Life
passiveTraits.description: The character feels a soft, guiding pull toward preservation, often stepping between danger and the innocent. This instinct can stay their hand in combat, urging nonlethal solutions. Even hardened foes may sense their reluctance to kill.
passiveTraits.summary: Instinctively shields the vulnerable, hesitating only long enough to spare a life.

passiveTraits.name: Motto
passiveTraits.description: You face turmoil with a soldier‚Äôs poise, shrugging off fear and doubt. Your steadiness helps companions regroup when morale falters. Even in dire moments, your presence anchors the line.
passiveTraits.summary: Unshakable calm steadies you amid chaos, lending quiet strength to allies.

feats.name: Commander's Strike
feats.description: With a sharp command or a guttural battle cry, you expose a fleeting weakness in an enemy‚Äôs guard. One ally who can hear you may immediately exploit the moment with a decisive attack or maneuver. Even if the blow misses, your guidance leaves the foe off-balance and vulnerable.
feats.summary: Call out an opening that lets an ally strike with sudden precision.

feats.name: Evasive Footwork
feats.description: You flow across the battlefield with effortless grace, leaving attackers swinging at empty air. When you move at least a short distance on your turn, you gain a brief surge of evasive momentum that makes incoming blows falter. Observers see only a streak of motion where you once stood.
feats.summary: Your movements blur into swift arcs that make you harder to strike.

feats.name: Riposte
feats.description: When an enemy‚Äôs swing cuts only through air, you draw on a flicker of otherworldly momentum‚Äîyour blade blurs, leaving a brief afterimage as you strike back in the same heartbeat. This counterattack seems to originate from where you stood a moment before, unnerving foes who rely on predictable motion.
feats.summary: Turn a foe‚Äôs failed strike into a flashing, spectral counterattack.

profile.backstory: Conscripted from a small farm in Hesse, Klaus has no interest in the American rebellion. He was forced into service and now finds himself guarding the secondary entrance of the Trenton Barracks, often using schnapps to stay warm.
profile.behavior: Leaning against a crate, nodding off. Due to his intoxication, Klaus is sluggish and unresponsive, making him less effective in combat.

passiveTraits.name: Hardy
passiveTraits.description: Born under an omen of winter, you carry a subtle heat that buffers you from cold harm. Even in blizzards, your breath stays steady and your fingers sure. Some say the frost itself recognizes you as kin.
passiveTraits.summary: Your body holds a quiet inner warmth, shrugging off chill winds and icy environments.

passiveTraits.name: Drunkard
passiveTraits.description: Your body never fully sits still, shifting as though caught in a gentle tide. This uncanny motion can unsettle foes but complicates precise actions. Skilled observers struggle to predict your next step.
passiveTraits.summary: You move in a loose, rolling gait that throws off enemies and allies alike.

passiveTraits.name: Unmotivated
passiveTraits.description: Their mind glides like a quiet breeze, slipping into reverie even in tense moments. They act slowly but spot hidden details others rush past. This calm detachment can steady allies or frustrate them.
passiveTraits.summary: Often lost in tranquil daydreams, moving at a peaceful, unhurried pace.

passiveTraits.name: Simple Minded
passiveTraits.description: Your mind drifts like mist‚Äîungraspable yet strangely steady. You resist mental clutter, occasionally glimpsing truths hidden behind noise. In chaotic scenes, you remain eerily focused.
passiveTraits.summary: Moves through chaos with serene clarity, unfazed by confusion or illusion.

passiveTraits.name: Stout
passiveTraits.description: Years of punishing labor left your muscles dense and your endurance uncanny. You recover from blows faster than most and stay standing long after others drop.
passiveTraits.summary: Your body shrugs off bruises and fatigue, hardened by brutal seasons of toil.

passiveTraits.name: Favorite Drink
passiveTraits.description: Your tongue tingles when storms brew, letting you predict changes hours ahead. Travelers prize your uncanny forecasts, though the gift sometimes brings uneasy visions.
passiveTraits.summary: Senses shifts in the air, tasting incoming weather on the tongue.

passiveTraits.name: Home
passiveTraits.description: Your presence evokes the warmth and security of a place once loved, granting subtle calm to companions and softening the edge of fear. In ancient ruins or wild frontiers, this quiet resonance steadies hearts. Even enemies may hesitate under its gentle familiarity.
passiveTraits.summary: A comforting aura that recalls a long‚Äëforgotten homestead, steadying allies in tense moments.

passiveTraits.name: Weapon
passiveTraits.description: Faint arcs dance over your skin, whispering warnings and jolting threats. Nearby creatures hesitate, sensing the air tighten. Once per scene, you may gain advantage on a reflexive check.
passiveTraits.summary: A crackling mantle of static energy that subtly shifts fate and startles foes.

passiveTraits.name: Combat Style
passiveTraits.description: Your steps drift like you're following distant tides, making foes misjudge your openings. When patience pays off, your delayed strikes land with startling precision.
passiveTraits.summary: Moves in slow, deliberate arcs, striking with uncanny timing.

passiveTraits.name: Morale
passiveTraits.description: This character remains unnervingly calm even as danger escalates, anchoring themselves and those nearby. Their steady presence can steady a wavering group or blunt fear effects. Enemies often underestimate their quiet determination.
passiveTraits.summary: Unshaken resolve that keeps the character focused under pressure, resisting panic and rallying allies with quiet certainty.

passiveTraits.name: Duty Station
passiveTraits.description: This character maintains a calm, watchful stillness that rarely wavers. Their vigilance makes them the first to notice subtle shifts in mood or movement. Allies often forget they're there‚Äîuntil it matters.
passiveTraits.summary: Stands unwavering in danger, alert to threats others miss.

feats.name: Second Wind
feats.description: Once per rest, you channel the tempest within your spirit to reclaim your strength. Crackling energy knits wounds and steadies your stance, restoring a surge of vitality in a flash. Nearby air stirs as if acknowledging your renewed determination.
feats.summary: You call on the wild pulse of the storm to rapidly restore your vitality.

feats.name: Fighting Style
feats.description: You have learned to weave subtle warding sigils into the flow of your coat or cloak. When you move at least a few steps or make a dramatic flourish, a brief shell of static energy clings to the fabric, granting you a momentary surge of protection against incoming harm. The effect dissipates quickly unless you keep moving, encouraging a mobile, swashbuckling style.
feats.summary: Your sweeping cloak crackles with protective force when danger nears.

profile.backstory: Feldwebel Baum, a Hessian Sergeant, has risen through the ranks with iron discipline. As a Level 8 Paladin/Fighter hybrid, he commands respect and fear. His military career is marked by strict adherence to duty, leading his troops with an unyielding hand. His presence in the center of the main room is a testament to his leadership, providing a 'Lead by Example' aura that buffs the AC of nearby Hessian soldiers.
profile.behavior: Reviewing a ledger by candlelight, hand resting on his blade, embodying discipline and readiness.

passiveTraits.name: Lead by Example
passiveTraits.description: In turmoil, your poise becomes a shield for others. Nearby companions gain subtle protection as your unshakable focus anchors their resolve. Even chaos hesitates before your quiet certainty.
passiveTraits.summary: Your calm presence steadies allies, granting minor resilience under fire.

passiveTraits.name: Aura of Devotion
passiveTraits.description: Your presence emits a warm, unseen glow that anchors companions‚Äô spirits. Those close to you find their minds harder to sway, as if wrapped in quiet reassurance.
passiveTraits.summary: A soft radiance steadies nearby allies against fear and deceit.

passiveTraits.name: Second Wind
passiveTraits.description: Your inner spark flares when danger peaks, knitting wounds with warm, spectral fire. The blaze also clears your thoughts, granting a moment of fierce clarity. This power returns after a short rest.
passiveTraits.summary: Once per rest, ignite inner spirit to restore modest vitality and briefly sharpen resolve.

passiveTraits.name: Improved Critical
passiveTraits.description: Your attacks hum with grim portent; whenever tension rises, even a near‚Äëmiss can become a brutal strike. Enemies often learn too late that fortune favors your wrath.
passiveTraits.summary: Your blows foreshadow carnage, striking with uncanny precision when fate leans your way.

passiveTraits.name: Weapon
passiveTraits.description: Faint arcs dance over your skin, whispering warnings and jolting threats. Nearby creatures hesitate, sensing the air tighten. Once per scene, you may gain advantage on a reflexive check.
passiveTraits.summary: A crackling mantle of static energy that subtly shifts fate and startles foes.

passiveTraits.name: Aura Effect
passiveTraits.description: Your steady focus manifests as a soft, protective pressure in the air. Allies within a few steps gain a slight defensive edge, as if your confidence shields them. Even in chaos, your quiet determination holds the line.
passiveTraits.summary: Your calm resolve radiates outward, granting nearby allies subtle protection.

passiveTraits.name: Command Style
passiveTraits.description: Your serenity holds firm even in chaos, lending quiet courage to allies and denying enemies the satisfaction of rattling you. Once per scene, you may steady another‚Äôs resolve with a measured word. Those who face you sense an unsettling, unbreakable patience.
passiveTraits.summary: Unshakable calm that steadies allies and unnerves foes.

passiveTraits.name: Location
passiveTraits.description: Soft echoes trail your steps, occasionally murmuring hints of hidden dangers or intentions. The effect is subtle, never fully reliable, but often unnervingly accurate.
passiveTraits.summary: Faint whispers cling to you, revealing scraps of nearby truths.

passiveTraits.name: Service Record
passiveTraits.description: Years of marching through distant conflicts have etched unshakable discipline into you. You rarely falter under pressure, drawing on battle-worn memory to steady allies and unsettle foes. Even peace carries the faint drumbeat of past campaigns.
passiveTraits.summary: Veteran instincts flare in tense moments, granting cool-headed focus born from long-forgotten wars.

passiveTraits.name: Military Honors
passiveTraits.description: Faint echoes of long‚Äëended conflicts drift through their mind, granting uncanny awareness in tense moments. These ghostly impressions rarely speak plainly but nudge them toward bold or cautious action. Allies find their timing eerie but reliable.
passiveTraits.summary: Whispers of past battles guide their instincts and steady their resolve.

feats.name: Protection
feats.description: When a nearby companion comes under threat, you step into the fray with instinctive precision, turning enemy blows aside with shield, steel, or sheer presence. Once per round, you may impose a hindrance on an attacker targeting an ally within arm‚Äôs reach, forcing them to fight through your stalwart defense.
feats.summary: You interpose yourself to blunt harm aimed at nearby allies.

feats.name: Fighting Style (Defense)
feats.description: A lifetime of surviving close calls has honed your ability to raise a defense a heartbeat before danger strikes. When you brace yourself, your stance hardens, granting a subtle but reliable boost to your protection as long as you remain vigilant. Even when surprised, your body shifts just enough to lessen incoming harm.
feats.summary: Your reflexive guard turns even glancing blows aside.

feats.name: Divine Smite
feats.description: You call down a shard of star-fire to lash your weapon strike with blistering brilliance. When you commit to the blow, the attack erupts in radiant power that scars both flesh and spirit, leaving foes dazzled by the afterimage. Creatures struck often feel as though the heavens themselves have judged them.
feats.summary: Imbue a weapon blow with searing celestial force.

feats.name: Remarkable Athlete
feats.description: Your footwork becomes a fluid dance, letting you glide over unstable ground, squeeze through narrow gaps, and pivot out of danger with uncanny ease. Once per rest, you may ignore hindering terrain for a brief moment, treating the world as light and open while you pass through it. Observers often swear you‚Äôre carried by a breeze only you can feel.
feats.summary: You move with drifting, effortless grace, slipping through tight spaces and terrain as though the air itself yields to you.
